A while ago, a website talked about the dangers of telling people where you are online. When you say, "I am here," you are also telling many people, some of whom you may not want to meet. This shows that sharing everything online can have bad sides. The internet gives us many chances to share our lives, and we might think it is fun. But sometimes, we can lose control and feel lost.

In the past, some people explored the internet and learned about its dangers. They faced problems like losing jobs and friends before social media was popular. These early internet users, called bloggers, have stories that can help us. 

In January 1994, a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall started sharing his life online. The internet was new and mostly used by students and scientists. Hall wanted to share his experiences. He created a blog where he wrote about everything. Many people read his blog because he was brave and wrote about many topics. 

One day, Hall's homepage changed to a sad video. He had fallen in love, but when he wrote about it, his partner said he had to choose between the blog and the relationship. Hall chose love, but he felt that sharing his life online made people not trust him. 

In 2002, a woman named Heather Armstrong had a blog called Dooce. She wrote about her job, but one day, a coworker shared her blog with their bosses. This caused her to lose her job. People often say things online that they would not say in real life. But what we do online can affect our real lives.

Armstrong's story had a happy ending. After some time, she got married and started blogging again about her family. Now, she is a popular "mommy blogger," and her writing helps her family. She learned that while the internet lets us say anything, we should be careful about what we share.

A while ago, some scientists warned people about a low-budget movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? This movie mixes real facts and stories to show that we do not understand a lot about our universe. Some scientists thought the movie was very bad and even dangerous. 

At first, I did not understand why the movie was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is very strange. But then the movie talked about how water can change because of thoughts. I heard that a Japanese researcher showed that water can look different based on how people feel. The movie showed nice pictures of ice crystals that looked good when people were happy and looked bad when people were sad. Many people liked these pictures, but scientists were not impressed. They wanted real proof, not just pretty pictures.

The movie's ideas were not strange enough. Scientists have found that water molecules have energy that comes from nowhere. This energy is connected to a force that makes the universe grow. The proof comes from many years of research in labs around the world. 

Scientists have discovered that the universe is made of unknown matter and is pushed by a mysterious force called "dark energy." Other discoveries are also amazing. Scientists found that our brains take about half a second to understand what is happening around us. They also think they found where modern humans began and how they spread around the world. Some scientists believe there is a link between life on Earth and the design of the universe.

Science is not finished. In fact, we know less than we thought. Many things in nature are still a mystery. Some scientists are trying to create a Theory of Everything, which would explain all the forces and particles in the universe. But many of us think the universe is best described with one word: incredible.

Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest. Writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. 

When I write a novel, I focus only on that. When I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. When I finish short stories, I want to write a novel again. I started writing short stories in 1984 after writing two short novels in 1975. At first, it was difficult, but I enjoyed it. 

One of my first short stories is called "Breaking Waves." It is in my first book of short stories, "Tales from Abroad." I like writing short stories because they do not take a long time to finish. It usually takes me about a week to write one. Writing a novel can take a year or two, and it can feel very long. 

Short stories can come from small ideas, like a word or a picture. Writing them is like playing jazz music; the story goes where it wants. If a short story does not work out, it is okay. Not every story has to be perfect. Even famous writers have stories that are not great. 

I learn from my mistakes in short stories and use that to help me write novels. Short stories help me try new things. They are like small memories I have shared with my readers. Writing short stories makes me happy.

Science is a way to learn about the world. It helps us understand many things, like tiny atoms and big galaxies. Science can make our lives better, but it can also create problems. Scientists study many ideas, and sometimes they disagree. New ideas can change what we think about the world.

In the past, scientists like Isaac Newton and Albert Einstein helped us understand more about how things work. They built on the ideas of others. Science is always changing. Sometimes, scientists find new things that surprise us, like radioactivity and black holes.

Science is important for everyone. It helps us understand nature, but it can also change it. We need to pay attention to science because it affects our lives and the future of our planet. Everyone should try to learn about science, so we can make good choices for ourselves and our children.

From around 2015, big book companies started to say that sales of ebooks were not growing anymore. Some even said sales were going down. This made people wonder if ebooks would be important in the future. One publishing worker said that the excitement about ebooks made companies invest too much money. He said his company lost faith in the power of printed books. 

Even though many people think ebooks and printed books can exist together, some still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question makes people think and talk a lot. Why do we think this way? Why do we see ebooks and printed books as a fight? The answers show us how we feel about new things and changes in our lives.

In my research, I found that people often think one type of media will replace another when new technology comes out. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would disappear. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books might disappear is not new. In 1894, some people thought that phonographs would replace books with audiobooks.

Many times, people have said that new things like movies, radio, and smartphones would end printed books. Some people worried that this would be bad for culture. Others thought ebooks would be much better. The idea that books might disappear often comes up when new technology is introduced. This shows our hopes and fears about change.

We feel strong connections to things like books and computers because they are part of our lives. Studies show that we can even name our cars or get upset when our laptops do not work. When new technology, like e-readers, comes out, it changes our relationship with things we love. We often miss the old things we used to have. This is why some people still want old products and technologies.

For example, when the printing press was invented in the 15th century, people wanted to find old manuscripts. When movies changed from silent to sound in the 1920s, people missed silent films. The same thing happened when photography changed from film to digital and from vinyl records to CDs. E-readers made people appreciate the feel and smell of printed books more.

This should make people feel better about printed books not disappearing. But the idea that something might go away will always be interesting. It shows both the power of technology and our fear of change. One way we understand change is by telling stories about it, like stories of loss. These stories are easy to remember and share. The idea that books might die reflects our excitement for the future and our fear of losing things we love.

Every weekday morning for a year and a half, I woke up at 5:30. I brushed my teeth, made coffee, and wrote about how great thinkers from the last 400 years worked. I wanted to show how they found time to be creative and productive. I wrote about their daily lives, like when they slept, ate, and worked. I hoped to show their personalities and habits.

A famous French writer, Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, said, "Tell me what you eat, and I shall tell you what you are." I say, "Tell me what time you eat and if you take a nap." This book is about how people create, not just what they create. It is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that you show something about yourself when you write. 

I have questions in this book that I think about in my life: How can you do creative work and also earn money? Is it better to work on one project or a little bit each day? When there is not enough time, do you give up things like sleep or a clean house? Or can you learn to do more in less time? 

I do not have all the answers, but I share how many successful people faced these same problems. I wanted to show how big ideas become small daily actions and how habits affect work. The book is called Daily Rituals, but it is really about people’s routines. Routines can seem boring, but they can help us use our time and energy better.

The psychologist William James said we should put part of our life on autopilot. Good habits can help us focus on important things. Ironically, he was a procrastinator and could not keep a regular schedule. 

This book started because of my own procrastination. One Sunday, I was at my job, trying to write a story. Instead of working, I cleaned my desk and made coffee. I am a morning person and work best in the morning. That afternoon, I looked online for other writers’ schedules. I found many interesting stories. I thought someone should collect these stories, so I started a blog called Daily Routines. 

In the blog, I shared people’s routines from biographies and articles. For this book, I gathered more information and tried to keep it interesting. I let the people I wrote about share their own words from letters and interviews. I also used summaries from other sources. 

This book would not be possible without the work of many biographers and journalists. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for more reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist when he was six years old. One day, he found a fossil called an ammonite on the beach. He studied hard in school and university to learn more about fossils. 

After finishing his studies, Howard wanted a job. He felt good about his skills, but he knew it could be hard to find a job in science. When a job opened at Tavistock College in London, he applied for it, but he did not expect to get it.

On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help him had a bad morning. He got into an accident and could not come to the interview. Another professor, who did not like the first one, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job. Howard was surprised but happy to have the job, even if it was not how he expected.

Howard liked his new job. He could plan his work and study fossils. But sometimes, things went wrong in his personal life. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes. He was very upset and went back to the college. He called to postpone his lecture and reported the theft.

While having coffee, Howard met a visitor from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. He learned about a new collection of fossils that needed to be studied. This was a big opportunity for him. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm and instead wanted to visit the museum in Nairobi to study the fossils.

Charles Spence eats many different foods. He even has ice cream made from bee larvae at home. It looks strange, but it tastes a little like nuts and flowers. Spence is a professor at Oxford University in the UK. He studies how our senses work together to help us taste food. He wants to make eating bugs more normal. 

Spence's work helps big food companies and restaurants. He studies how we enjoy food. For example, who we eat with, how food looks, and even the sounds around us can change how food tastes. In his book, The Perfect Meal, he shares interesting facts about eating. Did you know that the first person to order food in a restaurant usually enjoys their meal more? And when we eat with one other person, we eat about 35% more food. If we eat with three people, we eat 75% more!

Spence's lab is simple, not high-tech. He has soundproof rooms and old equipment. This helps him work with chefs who do not have much money for research. Many of his projects are funded by big food companies. Some people think that research funded by companies is not real science. But now, universities need to show that their work is useful, so this research is important.

Spence helps food companies reduce salt and sugar in their products. This is good for customers because it helps them stay healthy. Many companies do this slowly so that people do not notice the change. Spence says that when people know about the changes, they may not like the food as much.

Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a food project. They worked together to create a dish called "Sound of the Sea." Spence studies how sounds can change the taste of food. For example, high music can make food taste sweeter, while low music can make it taste bitter. Soon, an airline will play music that matches the food they serve.

At home, Spence has fun dinner parties. One time, they ate rabbit with the fur on the cutlery. Another time, they used colorful lights and sound machines to see how it changed their drinks. For Spence, home and food events are just like his lab.

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, like facts, rumors, and chatter. We need to find what is important and what we can ignore. We also do more things ourselves now. Thirty years ago, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us in stores. Now, we do these things by ourselves. 

We try to do many tasks at the same time, but this is not good for us. A scientist named Earl Miller says our brains are not good at multitasking. When we think we are doing many things at once, we are really just switching quickly from one task to another. This can make us less efficient. 

Multitasking can also make us feel stressed. It can increase stress hormones in our bodies, which can make it hard to think clearly. Our brains like new things, so it is easy to get distracted. This makes it hard to focus on one task. 

Research shows that trying to do many things at once can lower our intelligence. For example, if students do homework while watching TV, they do not remember the information well. It goes to the wrong part of the brain. Without distractions, they can remember better.

Making decisions while multitasking is also hard for our brains. Small decisions can take up a lot of mental energy, just like big decisions. This can lead to making bad choices later.

Many people find emails to be a big problem. We feel we must answer them, but it can be hard to do that and finish other tasks.

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night. He did this to throw pieces at visitors during the day. Some people wonder if he was being mean. In the US, female bats help other bats that are not their babies if those bats need help. Are they being kind? 

Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. They believed animals just acted in certain ways, and scientists only looked at the results. They thought animals did not have feelings or thoughts like humans. But now, this idea is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have feelings. This has led to new books about animal emotions, like "Wild Justice" by Mark Bekoff and "Do Fish Feel Pain?" by Victoria Braithwaite. 

This new research raises a big question: Do animals have thoughts like humans? Another question is about conscience, which is a sense of right and wrong. In an experiment with cows, those that opened a locked gate for food seemed happier than those that had help. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for eating beef? 

Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote "Second Nature," believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks this is a big change in how we think about ethics. Aubrey Manning, a professor, believes we should think more about how animals think. He says animals might have simpler thoughts than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings on animals. 

These experts may never agree because the main issue is not just science or morals, but philosophy. It is hard to define what consciousness is. Can we really know what it is like to be a bat? 

Balcombe did an important experiment that suggests starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In a study, some starlings lived in nice cages, while others lived in small, empty cages. Both groups learned to eat tasty worms. But when only bad worms were offered, only the starlings in nice cages would eat. Balcombe thinks the starlings in bad cages felt negative about life. 

Balcombe, who supports animal rights, believes our view of animals will change like how we now see racism. He says we cannot support animal rights while eating meat. If he were the only one with this view, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. He has written a book about animal behavior. He says we are starting to think differently about animals again. This is a complicated topic, and people have strong opinions about it.

Critical thinking is a way to understand what we read or hear better. Adrian West, a researcher, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store and process information, but it can also make it hard to think deeply about problems. West mentions that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean we make better decisions. 

Reading books has become less common, and this may hurt our critical thinking skills. Patricia Greenfield, a psychology professor, believes that focusing more on videos and fast media makes it harder to think about one thing deeply. We do not yet know exactly how technology affects our thinking. 

Technology can be both good and bad. For example, some video games can help us think better, while reading online can improve our analysis skills. Greenfield says that reading helps our imagination and critical thinking more than visual media like video games and TV. However, some visual media can help us process information quickly. 

Many young people may not reach their full potential because they do not spend enough time thinking deeply. How we see technology affects how we think critically. James Paul Gee, an expert on video games, says that video games can be good for learning. They can help children become smarter and improve their reasoning skills. Games like Sim City and Civilization teach decision-making and thinking skills in fun ways. 

In today’s world, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand how technology affects our thinking.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office but did not like it. He writes about how we should live our lives. His first book talks about the good things about working with your hands. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. 

One day, while shopping, he saw ads on a credit card machine while he was entering his pin number. He realized that it is hard to avoid things that take our attention. We often do not choose what to think about because of these distractions. It is harder to think or remember conversations. People do not want to talk to strangers anymore because they are tired of being interrupted.

Crawford says we see the world through things like video games and apps. These things show us what we want, but they can take over our lives. Many people complain about emails at work but still check emails in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to focus. 

Crawford believes that technology makes us more self-focused. We have many choices, which makes it hard to control ourselves. We often prefer to text instead of talking to friends. By only interacting with screens, we might lose important connections with real people. 

He gives an example of a gym. In the past, there was one music player for everyone. Now, people listen to their own music with earbuds. The gym used to be a place to meet others, but now it feels different. 

Crawford has two ideas to help. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he thinks we should do activities that help us connect with the real world, like cooking or playing sports. These activities help us focus on real things and not just on screens. 

He says that it is important to use our judgment and find ways to pay attention. This can help us feel better and focus on what is important.

"What do you do for work?" This is a common question. Many people answer it with their job. But for me, as a philosopher, it is not so easy. Saying I am a philosopher can sound like I think I am better than others. I study and teach philosophy, but calling myself a philosopher feels strange. 

People think philosophers are special because they think deeply about life. A famous philosopher named Aristotle said that thinking about life is very good. Many people today do not agree, but philosophy is still seen as important. Another philosopher, Socrates, said that a life without thinking is not worth living. This means that we should think about our lives and choices. 

You do not need to read many books or be very smart to think about your life. It just means looking closely at your daily experiences. You do not have to be away from society to think about it. In fact, thinking about life can help us make better choices. 

However, many philosophers work in universities and do not talk to regular people. This makes philosophy seem far away from real life. Philosophers often write for other experts, and this can make their ideas hard to understand. 

I sometimes call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. Recently, I feel this title does not show all my work. Ethics is often seen as rules and laws, but it is also about understanding social issues. 

An ethicist looks at whether something is right or wrong. For example, we might discuss if downloading movies illegally is wrong (it is). We can also talk about our ideas about responsibility and art. Philosophy helps us think more about our actions and beliefs. Sometimes we find out we already know something, and other times we learn that our beliefs are hard to explain. By thinking about these ideas, we can help everyone.

Food is important to many people, like food lovers, chefs, and those who enjoy eating. People often think about food and how it makes us happy. In the past, when philosophers talked about food, they usually meant something else, like learning or knowledge. Sometimes, they seemed to talk about food, but they were really discussing other ideas.

One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain. He talked about many things, but people now often connect his name with enjoying food and drink. Many restaurants and food shops use his name because they think it will attract customers.

Food is also social and cultural. The food we eat comes from history and is shared with our friends and family. Our communities help us grow and share food. We think about food more than other things, so it is a good topic to discuss.

When food is ready, critics write and talk about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; critics are just better at describing what food tastes like. Most discussions about how we see things focus on sight, but we should also think about taste.

Another interesting point is how we think about the beauty of food. We often talk about art and music being beautiful, but we don’t usually say the same about food. Some philosophers believe that food should be included in discussions about beauty, but food is eaten and gone, unlike art that stays.

There are also many questions about what we should eat. Should we eat organic food, free-range meat, or vegetarian meals? Our choices show our beliefs about what is right or wrong. Philosophers like to ask why we make these choices.

Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. When we cook at home, we share food with friends and family. But chefs in restaurants have to follow rules for their job. Their kitchens are not open to everyone, and they work with colleagues, not friends.

A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. The essay includes many interesting stories that make food philosophy fun to read about.

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He makes special board games called "legacy" games. When he was a child, he thought regular board games were not fun or challenging anymore. He wanted to make board games better. He asked, "Can board games have a story? Can choices in one game affect the next game?" 

He changed a classic game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, choices made by players can change the game forever. Players might have to tear up cards or change the game board. The game is played over several sessions, and players can remember past actions. Daviau said, "You can point to the board and say: 'You did this!'"

He also worked on a legacy version of a popular game called Pandemic, where players work together to cure diseases. His next game was called SeaFall. Pandemic Legacy was very popular, but SeaFall was a big test because it was a new game. In SeaFall, players are sailors exploring a new world.

Designers of legacy games must think about all the choices players can make. They need to test the games to see how they work. Jaime Barriga was a tester for SeaFall. He said it takes a lot of time to make the game right. Sometimes the game works well at first, but later it can break, and they have to fix it.

At first, Daviau did not think many people would like legacy games. He thought only a few people would enjoy them. But many players, like Russell Chapman, loved the idea. He said it was a big step forward in game design. Players enjoy learning new things in legacy games.

Another fan, Ben Hogg, said that even if players worry about changing the game, they still enjoy the adventure. He compared it to watching a new movie instead of the same one again. Legacy games tell stories like video games and popular TV shows.

Daviau wanted to be a TV writer but ended up in game design. He still loves telling stories. Matt Leacock, the creator of Pandemic, said making legacy games is like writing a book. You need to know how it starts and how it ends, but you also need to plan the story well.

Daviau is happy with his idea but wants to see how others use it. He thinks players will soon want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes the legacy format is a big change in how people think about board games.

One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He crawled across the floor and went into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was fun and many people shared it online. 

People like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play. Dr. Frans de Waal studies animals like gorillas and chimpanzees. He believes that we often do not see how smart animals are. He calls this "anthropodenial." 

Dr. de Waal says that animals can think about the past and future, feel empathy, and understand what others want. This means animals are smarter than we think. In the past, people believed animals were smart enough to be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, a famous scientist, said that humans and animals are different, but not in kind, just in degree.

In the 20th century, many people thought animals were just machines that react to things. This idea made people forget that animals have feelings and thoughts. But now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals can think like humans, even if they think differently.

He believes that tests for animal intelligence should match what animals can do. For example, squirrels are good at hiding nuts, even if they are not good at human memory games. In her book, Sy Montgomery talks about octopuses and how they might think humans are not smart because we cannot change our skin color like they can.

Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really knew how to escape to the ocean. But he knows that stories like Inky's help people see how smart animals can be. He once did a test with monkeys to see if they feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the ones with cucumbers got very upset. This study was published, but a video of the monkeys made more people believe it.

This shows how interesting and complex animal minds can be.

Robots are becoming very important in our world. They are not just in stories anymore; they are in factories and other places. Many people think that robots will do most of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. But many also believe their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Robots will change many jobs soon.

For example, a company in Australia made a robot called Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour. Two human workers would take a whole day to do this. Another robot, Tally, helps in supermarkets. It checks if the shelves have enough products and if they are priced correctly.

Some people think robots will create new jobs for skilled workers, like technicians. But others worry that we need to keep human skills in jobs. Dr. Jing Bing Zhang studies how robots will change work. He says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and work well with humans. In three years, many big companies will have a chief robotics officer. In five years, salaries in the robotics field will go up, but there will still be many jobs that need skilled workers.

Dr. Zhang says that lower-skilled workers will be affected by robots. He believes they should learn new skills instead of waiting for the government to help them. 

New robots will also be made for homes. These robots will be able to talk and interact with us. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges. We need new rules to keep people safe and protect their privacy.

With many jobs at risk, education is very important. Countries need more students in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to be ready for the future.

Alfred Brendel is a famous pianist. He played classical music for over sixty years. He was very smart and serious about music. He played many pieces and recorded them, but he did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be fun, but he did not show this during his concerts. He worked hard, traveling and performing all the time.

A few years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts. Kit asked Brendel for piano lessons. At first, Brendel did not think this was a good idea. He had very few students and did not want to start teaching now. He remembered a famous pianist who said, “You don’t ask a mountain guide to teach a child how to walk.” But when Brendel heard Kit play, he changed his mind. Kit was about 14 years old and played very well from memory. He even gave Brendel a CD of his performance, which was beautiful. Brendel thought, “I need to make time for him.”

Now, Kit is 19 years old. He is always busy learning new things, like languages, math, computer coding, and playing tennis. His mother is always with him. Kit also writes music. Brendel thinks this is important because it helps Kit understand music better. He noticed that Kit has a great memory and can read music very well. Kit listens carefully to his own playing and understands Brendel’s lessons.

Brendel is careful not to raise expectations for Kit. He does not like when newspapers call Kit the best pianist of the 21st century. He thinks this can be harmful. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they still need time to learn other things.

Now, at 80 years old, Brendel is more relaxed. He says that when he was young, he did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve certain goals by the time he was 50. When he turned 50, he felt he had done most of those things, but he still wanted to do more. Even though he does not play as much now, he still thinks about music and enjoys his new life.

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My grandad’s garden was by a river. It went down gently to the water. You could not touch the river, but you could hear the water and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – a nice place to relax. 

Grandad’s garden was simple. He did not have a big greenhouse like some neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old windows and plastic. At home, my dad was quiet. He was not serious all the time. He liked to say funny things. One of his favorite phrases was, “It’s immaterial to me.” He could have just said, “I don’t mind,” but he liked the big word. 

My dad left school without any special papers and became a plumber. He did not love plumbing; it was just a job. He was not very ambitious, but once he and my mom thought about moving to Canada. They never did. 

My dad was good at fixing things at home. He could build bookshelves and cupboards very well. My parents only moved to a new house once. But my mom liked to change the furniture a lot. Just when you got used to one chair, a new one would appear. The biggest change was when a piano came into the house. I wanted to like it, but it made me nervous. I liked the two shiny candlesticks on it, but my mom said they were too fancy, and they disappeared when I was at school. I never got to play the piano, but my sister had lessons. When I asked my mom why I couldn’t play, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”

I liked the river best when I could choose between the moors, woods, or river. I could imagine many things by the river. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals with the front cut out for my toes. I walked along the riverbank looking for a good place to take off my sandals. I would leave them with my picnic and look for fish in the water. After trying to keep the fish alive in the yard, I put them back in the river.

I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard. One day, my dad said, “There is a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. I thought you might like it.” For a moment, he surprised me. He might have wanted me to be a carpenter, but I think he hoped I would do well as a gardener. Even if he did not like gardening, he saw how much I loved it.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his island, the Isle of Muck, in Scotland. I am with him. The strong wind makes it feel like we could be blown away. But Lawrence is calm. He has a sheepdog named Tie. The wind is loud, but Lawrence feels at home on his island.

Lawrence shows me around. He points to another island called Eigg. He says the island next to it is Rum, and it gets a lot of rain. I see dark clouds over Rum. He also mentions another island called Soay. 

Suddenly, Lawrence says he needs to move his sheep. We walk down the hill. He tells me that the Isle of Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese here eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived on this island for 3000 years. 

While herding the sheep, Tie the dog is not doing a good job. Lawrence tells him to go to the right, but Tie goes straight through the sheep. Lawrence is disappointed. 

The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, run the farm. Their son Colin takes care of the island cottages, and their daughter Mary runs the hotel with her husband, Toby. Mary loves that her two boys can play outside and sail in the summer. 

Life on the island is not always easy. There is electricity only sometimes. One night, I wait for the lights to come on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. There is also no mobile phone service. Mary tells me that some people go to the hill to use their phones, but most just put them away. 

Today, a boat brings groceries and three musicians. They play music in the tearoom, and everyone enjoys it. That night, by the fire, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. Her father bought a farm on Soay without seeing it. Jenny had to manage it, but she only knew how to type.

I go to bed with the sound of rain. I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to get fresh fish from a fisherman named Sandy. I bring it back to Mary, and by 7 pm, we have a delicious dinner.

The next morning, I have to take a ferry to another island. Many ferries have been canceled because of bad weather. If my ferry does not come, I will stay on Muck for two more days. Part of me wants that to happen.

The game design industry used to be for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many thought video games were just a hobby for young people. Now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this industry. Making video games, especially those based on movies, needs many team members and a lot of skill and hard work.

Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says it is hard to work in big companies. But the industry needs game designers. They need not just the big bosses but also people who design parts of the games. 

So, how can you start a career in this industry? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks you should just make games. You need to create something to get a job. Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life. 

Another expert, John Field, says it is not easy to do it alone. A good course in games can help you. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up. They love all kinds of entertainment and art. They may have worked for a few years after school but know that games are what they want to do. They are not just fans; they are excited about the future of games.

Connections can also help you get ahead in the game industry. Many people think of video games as something only boys play, but now many families play together. Smartphones have many new games through apps and social media. John believes there is a lot of room for growth in games. They are fun and a great way to learn new things.

Violet Hetherington was in a long line at the dock in Southampton. She was waiting to get on a ship called the Queen Caroline. Her friend Annie had told her to arrive late so she would not wait too long. But now, Violet was not happy. 

After some time, an announcement said there was a problem with the computers. The people waiting became upset. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to get on the ship. Violet felt like she made a mistake coming on this cruise. 

She looked for her phone in her bag but could not find it. This made her more worried. She needed her phone to call a taxi company to see if she left it in the taxi. She asked a couple behind her if she could use their phone. They said yes. Violet called her son Harry and left a message for him to ask their neighbor Kristina to check if her phone was at home. 

Finally, the line started to move, and Violet gave her travel documents to the worker. When she got inside the ship, it looked like a fancy hotel, but not a very nice one. There were shiny things everywhere, and the place was crowded with tired passengers. 

Violet took the elevator to the twelfth floor. When she got to her room, she was happy to see that it had a balcony, just like she wanted. She had worried about this, but now she felt relieved. She had paid a lot of money for this room to make sure she had a good view of the sea.

John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction. He wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos by Vivian Maier, a street photographer. Maloof has collected many things from Maier's life, like her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives. He also has 8mm movies and audiotapes.

One morning, Maloof looked at all the things he found. He felt lucky. He said, "When I bought this, I had no idea what it was." Maloof is a flea market seller and could have sold everything to someone else.

Maloof and his friend Anthony Rydzon are learning about Maier's life. They talked to families who knew her when she worked as a nanny. Maier was born in 1926 in New York and spent part of her childhood in France. She came back to New York in 1951 and moved to Chicago in 1956 to work as a nanny. Maier was a private person and always had a camera. She wore big coats, wide hats, and sturdy shoes. 

Maren Baylaender, whose husband hired Maier, said, "She always had her camera on her day off. We didn’t see her until late at night." Maier liked movies and had strong opinions about them. She was not very social, but she walked the streets with her camera and talked to people. 

Rydzon said, "She was a true artist and followed her dreams." Maier's work is real art; she did not do it for money. She took pictures of women, children, old people, and the poor. Photography expert Larry Silverman said, "Vivian has many interesting pictures." He wonders if she created her own style or learned from other photographers.

Maloof has many negatives stored in fireproof cabinets. He did not care about photography until he found Maier's work. Inspired by her photos, he started taking pictures himself. He said, "I realized the people and street scenes were more important than I thought." Now, Maloof wants to share Vivian Maier's name and get her into history books.

Eleanor Catton is a young writer from New Zealand. Her book, The Luminaries, is very successful. I talked to her in the UK when her book was popular. She was calm and had just come from Germany. The next day, she would go back to New Zealand.

Eleanor told me a funny story. Once, at passport control, an official asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed her book and the official asked, “What is it about?” This is a hard question for a writer. 

The Luminaries takes place in New Zealand in the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men are trying to solve them. The story is very complicated. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, but she found that the past made the story more interesting. Her book is over 800 pages long because she wanted to give a good story to each of the 20 main characters.

When I asked her how it feels to be successful at a young age, she said it feels nice. She feels that people in New Zealand share in her success. She also said it can be annoying when people think her book is not serious.

Eleanor wanted to write the book in a special way. Each part of the book is shorter than the one before. This makes the story go faster. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book. If readers notice them, that’s good, but it’s not necessary.

Even with its special structure, The Luminaries is still an exciting murder mystery. Eleanor did not plan the whole story before she wrote it. She liked to write herself into difficult situations and then find a way out. She wanted to make the book fun for readers.

Eleanor also loves TV dramas. She uses cliff-hangers and different points of view in her writing. I asked if she would like to write for TV. She said that could be cool.

Eleanor is very excited when she talks about writing and New Zealand. She notices that being in a different place changes her ideas. Many writers leave New Zealand to find new inspiration. But for now, New Zealand is still her home. I hope it helps her write many more books.

Jonny Kinkead is a man who loves guitars. When he was a boy, he played with a guitar and made things in his dad's garage. For the last forty years, he has made guitars by hand. Jonny says, "I love the guitar. It is amazing that two pieces of wood can make beautiful music."

Jonny learned to play guitar when he was eleven years old. At sixteen, he wanted a bass guitar. Instead of saving money, he decided to make one himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood make different sounds. He had made model boats and planes with his brothers, so he knew how to build things. His dad taught him how to use tools.

Jonny made his first bass guitar, but he did not think about making guitars as a job. He liked painting and sculpture too. After school, he studied architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left school. He realized that making guitars is like making art, but it is also useful because people can play them.

For ten years, Jonny cleaned windows to help pay his bills. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials. As he became known as a good guitar maker, he could charge more money. Even now, he can only make about ten guitars a year, so he does not earn a lot.

In the beginning, Jonny went to music festivals to show his guitars. He wanted musicians to try them and tell their friends. He also had to learn how to price his guitars because he did not think about money much.

Jonny thinks it is easier for new guitar makers today. When he started, people thought only American guitars were good. But now, UK-made guitars are respected. He believes new makers should take classes to learn, but they should also try making things on their own. Jonny says, "If you make mistakes, you learn more."

When people talk in English, they often start by talking about the weather. A famous writer, Dr. Johnson, said that when two English people meet, they first talk about the weather. This is still true today. Many people wonder why English people talk about the weather so much. They think it is because English weather is interesting. 

An American writer, Bill Bryson, says that English weather is not very exciting. He points out that in England, there are no big storms like tornadoes or hurricanes. But another writer, Jeremy Paxman, disagrees. He thinks English weather is interesting because it is always changing. 

I believe both writers miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. When they say things like, “Nice day, isn’t it?” or “Ooh, isn’t it cold?” they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are just ways to start a conversation or fill a pause. 

Talking about the weather helps English people connect with each other. There are three main times when they talk about the weather: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or when there is a quiet moment. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather all the time. They might start with a weather greeting, then talk a little more about the weather, and return to it if the conversation stops. This is why many people think English people are obsessed with the weather.

Alice Leader was in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was with her class of 12- and 13-year-olds. She wanted to tell them how amazing it was that the Romans built a wall that is 120 km long and 5 meters high about 1900 years ago. The students chose this trip instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. They wanted to know why the wall was built, but Alice felt she did not have good answers.

Alice could not find a good book about life at the Wall in Roman times, so she decided to write one herself. She stopped teaching after 31 years and became a writer in 2001. She felt nervous but excited about this new job. Alice said, “Teaching is like acting. It is hard work. Writing is fun, but it is not so tiring.” Her old teaching friends are jealous because she still talks to children through her stories.

Alice wants her books to be different from many other books for kids today. Many books are about sad things or are just fantasy, like Harry Potter. Her books are not like that. She always taught English and History together. She loves to see when a child goes from being bored to being interested. “I like it when children are bored because then I have to make them interested,” she said.

Alice started writing because she felt she had time when her two sons were leaving home. Her head teacher suggested she take a creative writing course. At first, Alice did not want to go. But she had to send a story to the teachers to get into the course. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and their baby. After three hours, she had 30 pages and sent it in. She got accepted right away.

During the course, other students liked her story and told her to publish it. Alice asked her school head teacher for a year off to write her first book. Her husband, Zachary Leader, helps her with editing. He changes her sentences and suggests new words. Alice likes to add more scenes to her stories. She thinks they work well together.

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked two brothers, Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, to race each other. Jonny is older and a champion triathlete. They raced in the Yorkshire Dales in northern England. Jonny drove a car on the road, and Alistair rode a mountain bike across the countryside.

“I’m excited!” said Jonny at the start line. “I have never done this before. The views are beautiful, and I will be warm in the car.” Alistair was ready too, wearing warm cycling clothes. He said, “I have seen Jonny drive, so I am not sure he will win. I might stop for tea!”

The race started at Semerwater lake and finished at Fleet Moss, which is very high up. Jonny’s car could go fast, but Alistair had to climb a steep hill on his bike. They quickly started the race. Alistair rode away on his bike, and Jonny drove off in his car.

Jonny’s car faced a problem right away. A big tractor was in the road. “Welcome to Yorkshire,” he said to the cameraman. “If Alistair wins, it’s because of this farmer!” After the tractor, Jonny drove on. Alistair was having a hard time. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the hill. Sheep watched him as he walked with his bike.

Finally, Alistair reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride fast. In the car, Jonny had to go slowly through narrow roads and small villages. He was trying to get to the finish line quickly.

Neither brother knew who was winning. Jonny drove fast to the finish line, and Alistair rode hard from the other side. When Alistair reached the finish, he asked the crowd, “Is he here?” They said no. He raised his arms and shouted, “Yes!”

A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in his car. “Well done,” he said to Alistair, but he looked sad. “I’m upset.”

When you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon, it is very quiet. You bounce the ball on the soft grass. You throw it up to serve and hit it. You can only hear your own shots. The quiet is good for my game. I try to focus only on the match and the point I am playing. 

When a point ends, the silence breaks. People clap and cheer. I hear them, but it feels far away. I do not think about the fifteen thousand people watching me. I do not think about the millions watching on TV. I am playing Roger Federer in the 2008 Wimbledon final. This is the biggest match of my life. 

I always wanted to play at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, my coach, told me it is the biggest tournament. When I was 14, I dreamed of playing there and winning. Before 2008, I played Federer and lost two times. In 2006, I was happy just to be there. But in 2007, I was very sad. I knew I could have played better. I cried for half an hour after that match. Losing hurts, especially when you have a chance to win.

Toni usually does not comfort me, but that time he said it was okay to cry. He told me there would be more chances to play at Wimbledon. I thought this was my last chance. I know that a professional athlete's career is short, and I want to make the most of it. 

But Toni was right. I had another chance in 2008, just one year later. I felt ready. The night before the final, I had dinner with my family and friends. We did not talk about the match because I was already thinking about it in my mind. I wanted to keep that space for myself until the match started.

In April 1957, a young English woman named Jane Goodall came to Africa. She wrote home and said, "I am living in the Africa I have always wanted." Jane spent most of her life in Africa. She worked as a journalist, scientist, and activist. She became famous for her work with chimpanzees. 

In 1963, the National Geographic Society helped make Jane Goodall well-known by sharing her research in articles and TV shows. She also wrote many books, including children's books and a popular book called "In the Shadow of Man." This book has been translated into 47 languages and is still available today. 

Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. Many stories have been told about her life, but they often focus on her adventures and not her real achievements. Jane Goodall is important because she helped us understand how chimpanzees live and feel. 

Before her work, people thought chimpanzees were very dangerous and did not know much about them. Jane discovered that chimpanzees eat meat and use tools. She showed that chimpanzees have feelings like humans and live in social groups similar to ours. 

Her book, "The Chimpanzees of Gombe," is very important for studying chimpanzees. Jane Goodall's research changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans. 

Even as a child, Jane showed her love for animals. When she was five years old, she wanted to know how hens lay eggs. One day, she crawled into a henhouse and waited quietly for five hours to see. This curiosity was the start of her journey as a biologist.

Shirley Ford is a voice actor. In our first talk, she uses many funny voices. She sounds like a cheeky boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and a fast-talking alien. People know her voices from children’s TV shows and cartoons. Shirley says, “I just did a voiceover about back injuries. I had to learn many medical words quickly.”

Shirley explains what it takes to do voiceovers. She says, “Many actors think they can do funny voices, and some can. But it is more than that. You must make the script come alive for people who cannot see you.” Many famous actors want to do voiceovers, but they often do not get the jobs because they are used to acting with their whole bodies.

After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be a regular actor. Sometimes, she sang jingles for TV ads. One day, the man at the recording studio asked her to try out for a rabbit in a cartoon. She thought it was silly but tried it for fun. She got the part! Shirley found out she could do voices and liked voiceover work.

In her second film, she played the main character and also her brother and mother. Many women voice small boys and girls because their voices are higher. It is hard to find child actors, so production companies often choose adult women instead. Shirley learned to make different sounds and collects new voices by watching children’s TV.

Shirley enjoys working on cartoons the most. She also does educational videos and ads. She says, “It is hard to sound excited about something I don’t care about, but I have learned to smile while talking. It makes my voice sound happy.” When she works on animation, it feels like a holiday because she enjoys working with other actors.

There is a lot of competition for voiceover jobs. A good showreel, which shows what an actor can do, is very important. Shirley says, “It is worth making a strong showreel. There are agencies that help voice actors with this.” She believes she is successful because she works hard and does not give up. 

For people who want to be voice actors, Shirley suggests going to special workshops. She loves voices and becomes the characters she plays. She says, “If I do an American voice in the studio, I might talk like that for hours or days. My children are used to me speaking in different voices.”

People often ask me how I became a cartoonist. This is normal because many kids dream of being a cartoonist, like they dream of being a race car driver. But most people stop dreaming and choose other jobs, like being a lawyer or making car parts. It seems silly to think you can make money by drawing funny pictures. But some people do it.

Not everyone becomes a cartoonist in the same way. Most cartoonists have wanted to do this for a long time. I loved comic strips as a kid and drew a lot in school. I studied graphic design in college. After I finished school, I showed my drawings to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted political cartoons. I drew some ideas, and they bought them. Soon, I was making enough money to live.

You don’t need much to be a cartoonist. You don’t need a college degree or a lot of money. You just need your brain, your hand, and something to draw with. But it is not easy. It is better to have other skills too. I have done political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also written and designed. I take any job because I can learn from all kinds of work. It helps to be smart and curious about the world.

Now, being a cartoonist is different. Many cartoonists used to work for newspapers and magazines, but that is changing. Today, cartoonists often have to sell their own work. If you are good at selling, you will do better. I have seen cartoonists who are not very creative but are good at business do better than very talented artists who do not know how to sell.

Some people worry too much about others stealing their ideas. They are scared to show their work. To protect your drawings, you can write a small ‘c’ for ‘copyright’ and put your name and the date next to it. But really, it is more likely that no one will care about your work. If someone does take your cartoon and it becomes popular, it can be a great opportunity!

Twenty years ago, I was moving to a new house and cleaning out my things. I decided to throw away an electric guitar that my dad gave me for my 16th birthday. It was a nice black guitar from Japan. I usually don’t like to throw things away, so I felt bad about it. I took the guitar to the dump. Just as I was going to put it in the trash, a young man came up to me. He looked confused and asked, “You’re not going to throw that away, are you?” I said yes, but I started to feel sad. He asked if he could have it, and I said yes. We went our separate ways.

After that day, I felt very sad about giving away my guitar. A few months ago, I got an email that changed everything. I remembered a story about a man who lost his wedding ring in the ocean. Ten years later, he found it in a fish he was eating. That’s how I felt when I opened the email. It was from a man named Keith Rushton, who fixes and sells guitars. He said, “I have your electric guitar.” 

The guitar had been sold many times since I gave it away. Keith found my name on a label on the back of the guitar. He used my name to find me online. He contacted me through the newspaper I work for and offered to sell it back to me. I was so happy! I would have given him anything for it, but his price was fair. I remembered how my dad liked to put name labels on my things, even my guitar. My parents wanted me to learn classical guitar because it was popular in the 1970s. I loved the sound of it, but I didn’t get better at it. So, I switched to the electric guitar, which was easier to play.

When I opened the box that Keith sent me, I remembered my birthday in 1978 when my parents gave me the guitar. It felt smooth and smaller than I remembered. I sat down to play, but then I stood up and put a strap on my shoulder because that is how you play an electric guitar. My fingers remembered where to go. I couldn’t draw the chords, but my hands knew what to do. My fingers felt a little pain from pressing the strings. 

The electric guitar is not usually played alone. Now that I am learning it again, I think I should start a band. My son is learning the saxophone, so maybe we can play together. Or maybe I can find other people my age who feel like I do. We could call ourselves “The Regainers!”

Many people are talking about sleep now. I wrote a book called Insomniac about people who cannot sleep. I wanted to tell everyone that not getting enough sleep is bad for our minds and bodies. People who have trouble sleeping know how important sleep is. It is good that people are paying more attention to sleep. 

But what about dreams? I do not hear much about dreams. When you wake up early, you lose the last hour or two of sleep. This lost sleep is mostly REM sleep, which is when we dream a lot. Our best and most memorable dreams happen in REM sleep, just before we wake up. A person who lives 90 years will spend about six or seven years dreaming in REM sleep.

When scientists take away REM sleep from people, they dream more the next night. This shows that dreams are important. In 1953, scientists found REM sleep. Many people thought that dreams could help us understand our minds, but later studies showed it is more complicated. Now, scientists study dreams more for their physical reasons than for their psychological reasons.

Robert Stickgold, a sleep scientist, says that there is not much agreement among dream researchers. Dreams are important. A study showed that actors, writers, and directors remember and use their dreams better than other people. This means that creative people have a special connection to their dreams. 

But do only creative people need dreams? Everyone needs to think creatively. Stickgold says that dreams help us connect ideas in new ways. When people wake up from REM sleep and think of a word, their ideas are more original than when they wake from other sleep stages. They think of surprising connections. 

I write better when I wake up from strong dreams. Even a bad dream can help me think better. On those days, I can write quickly because I have many ideas. I do not know how it works, but it helps. 

Creativity is not just for writers or artists. We all need to think well in our complex world. We need to dream to help us think creatively and solve problems with others. This is why dreams are important.

Susie Ray left London twenty years ago. She moved to a small town by the sea in south-west England. In her studio, you can see empty frames on the walls and pictures of her two daughters. Susie is a copyist artist. She can paint famous artworks very well. She has painted works by artists like Renoir, Monet, and Van Gogh. People often think her paintings are the real ones. 

Her copies can sell for a few hundred pounds to £12,000, depending on how much time she spends on them. Susie does not tell who her clients are, but they include galleries and collectors. Some collectors want to show off their art, even if it is not the original. Susie knows that some famous people show her copies as if they are real. 

When she copies a painting, she tries to make it look very real. She puts her name on the back of the painting. It is illegal to say a copy is the original. Susie does not want to get into trouble, so she does not do that. She is not very rich, but she is more secure now. 

Before being a copyist, Susie worked as an illustrator for a botanical garden. She learned to be very accurate in her work. She is happy she found a job that pays better. When young artists ask her for advice, she tells them to learn to draw well. 

Susie can draw many things, but she likes to copy French impressionist paintings the most. She thinks people often think modern art is easy, but it can be very hard. 

Some people wonder why Susie does not make her own art. She has tried, but she feels her own paintings do not look as good as her copies. Susie is a perfectionist and wants to do her best.

Ellen MacArthur loved the sea and wanted to be the fastest sailor. She loved sailing since she was a child. When she was on her boat, she felt very connected to it. But when she was on land, she felt bored and wanted to be back on the ocean.

One time, she came second in a big race called the Vendée Globe. After the race, she showed me her small boat, Kingfisher. She lived there for 94 days. She planned everything carefully, even how many paper towels she needed. She had special food and a small stove. Her boat was very important to her, and she took good care of it.

Ellen had a big moment when she went to South Georgia, a lonely island. She helped with a study about birds called albatrosses. This made her think about how we use the earth’s resources. She saw old whaling stations and felt sad. She thought we take too much from the earth and do not give back.

Now, Ellen talks about saving the planet. She says we cannot make more coal, oil, or gas. We need to use them wisely. At first, she told people to use less, but now she talks about re-using things. She visits factories and talks to people about how we can use resources better.

Ellen started a charity called the Ellen MacArthur Foundation. It helps young people think about a better future. She misses sailing and the adventure of being at sea. But now, she feels her work is very important. She wants to help people understand how to take care of our planet.

Jordan Romero is 13 years old. He wants to be the youngest person to climb Mount Everest. If he does this, he could be very famous. Jordan wants to inspire other kids to go outside and climb too. His climbing team is his father, Paul, and his mother, Karen. They call themselves "Team Romero." 

Jordan has a big goal. If he climbs Everest and another mountain called Vinson Massif in Antarctica, he will be the youngest person to climb the Seven Summits. The Seven Summits are the highest mountains on each continent. Not many people do this before they are thirty years old. Jordan has already climbed five of them. He might finish before he turns 14.

Some famous climbers think it is not a good idea for a 13-year-old to climb Everest. They say Jordan is strong, but they worry if he is ready for such a big challenge. They think he may not have enough experience to be safe. 

Paul, Jordan's father, knows about these worries. He says, "I hear the criticism, but we have to keep going. We think about the risks, but we believe we can help Jordan." Paul feels confident because Jordan is getting stronger and more mature.

Paul says this project is not just about making Jordan famous. At first, Jordan wanted to climb when he was older, but then they thought, "Why not now?" They talk to Jordan often to make sure he still wants to do it. 

When asked why he wants to climb, Jordan says, "I just want to reach my goal." In the past, not many people cared about being the youngest or fastest climber. Now, every adventure is shared online, and people want to see records broken. 

This makes it hard for Jordan. Some people think that trying to break records takes away the fun. But if Jordan wants to inspire others, he needs to share his journey online. This means he has to take photos and give interviews. He has to do something amazing, like climbing Everest.

Paul says, "If Jordan comes home and wants to stop climbing and play basketball instead, we will stop this project and go to the gym."

When you see a teenager with an MP3 player, they are probably not listening to classical music. Many people know many pop groups, but most of my friends do not know who Brahms is. I just started studying music, but my classmates know as little about classical music as other teenagers. If you do not know who wrote the music, you probably do not have any of their recordings. This is sad for people who love classical music. Last year, only 3% of concert tickets sold were for classical music, and most classical recordings sell only 300 copies. 

Why is classical music less popular now? Older people are upset about our love for TV and video games, but I do not think this is the reason. The truth is that classical music does not interest most people, especially teenagers, who buy the most music and concert tickets. Some teenagers do go to classical concerts, but they are few. I play in an orchestra, but I do not really like classical music. I listen to many types of music, but I listen to classical music very little.

Why don’t teenagers like classical music? First, classical music has many changes in speed and mood, which can be hard for us. We like fast talking, fast playing, and fast thinking. Experts say we can only pay attention for about three minutes, which is too short for most classical music pieces but just right for pop songs. Pop music is simple and easy to listen to, while classical music needs more time and focus. Also, pop music talks about things that matter to teenagers, while classical music often does not.

How we listen to music has changed too. In the past, families would play music together at home, and playing an instrument was important. Now, we can find any music we want online, but we rarely listen to classical music. When was the last time you heard classical music in a store? Some teachers say that more people are going to classical concerts now, but I think not many of them are teenagers. In my orchestra, we play classical music in many places, but I mostly see older people in the audience. 

Some people think schools are to blame for teenagers not liking classical music, but many kids want to play classical music in their school orchestras. They come early to practice and stay after school to rehearse. They like classical music when they play it, but it is not their favorite music to listen to. When we want to relax, we always choose pop music.

Bonnie Wyndham got out of her mother’s car and looked at Almonside School. She said, “I’ll make you sorry I’ve come here,” but she said it nicely. Her mother was getting out of the car too, so she didn’t hear Bonnie. Bonnie didn’t mind if she did. Her mother knew how Bonnie felt. 

Mrs. Wyndham looked around. Almonside School was strange. It had many buildings hidden in the trees on a hill. It was confusing at first. Then she saw signs: Science block, gym, riding centre… “Riding centre,” Bonnie said, suddenly interested. “Headmaster’s study,” her mother said. “This way.” Bonnie followed her mother along a wide path between the trees. 

“I wish you’d walk beside me instead of behind me,” Mrs. Wyndham said tiredly, but she didn’t expect Bonnie to do it. A few minutes later, her mother was talking to Bonnie’s new headmaster in his office, while Bonnie waited outside. Suddenly, Bonnie stood up. “Why should I just sit here?” she thought. “I’ll be thrown out soon anyway, so why not go?” She left the building and went to the riding centre. 

There was a nice old building for the horses and a big place for indoor riding. Bonnie looked around, but no one was there. She walked carefully to the horses. Bonnie respected the horses. They were well taken care of. Almost every stall had a horse. She looked at each horse and thought about them. “I know what you’re doing here,” she said to a small pony, touching its nose. 

Then she saw the next horse and stopped. “But aren’t you the best!” she said. He was brown with a little white. He looked lively, and Bonnie liked that. “I feel like we’ve met before,” she said, petting his neck. “I rode you to win a big competition in my dreams.” The horse’s name was Maverick. Bonnie wanted to ride him. “I wonder where I can find a bridle and a saddle,” she thought. 

The room with the riding gear was open. Bonnie was happy to find it. She put a saddle on Maverick’s back and forgot about her mother and the headmaster. When she sat on the big horse outside, she felt like a queen. At her old school, they called her Queen Bee, and she laughed at the memory. “You’re the best horse I’ve ever ridden, Maverick,” she said. “I know about horses, even if I don’t know about anything else.” 

She nudged him to walk, then to trot. “If I stay here, I think we could be great friends,” she said. She rode around the paddock. The rhythm was exciting, and a little breeze made her cheek feel warm. She could tell Maverick trusted her, and she felt sure he would jump well.

I met Cody Simpson before. He is a quiet and confident person. Cody is 15 years old and comes from Australia. He has made many popular songs. 

Cody started playing guitar when he was six years old. He began writing songs when he was seven. He loved swimming and surfing more than anything else at that time. When he was 13, he was in high school and posted some videos online. 

These videos changed his life. He first shared a video of him and a friend singing at a school concert. Many fans wanted to see more videos of him. So, Cody made more videos at home. People loved them. 

Cody was also a great swimmer. He trained hard with good coaches. But then, music companies wanted him. He had to choose: stay in Australia and keep swimming or move to the US to make music. Cody decided to take the chance. 

“It was hard to choose my career at such a young age,” he said. He had to tell his swimming coach and friends that he was moving. They were surprised because he is a quiet kid. 

Cody moved with his family to the US. He gave up swimming to follow his music dream. His family is not in the spotlight, but they support him. Cody believes it is important to have good people around you. 

Sometimes, he thinks about how his choice affects his little brother and sister. His brother is eight years old and travels with him. Cody worries about this sometimes, but his family always supports him. 

Cody says that success comes from saying “yes” to big opportunities, even if it is scary. “Everything happened so fast,” he said. “Now, I go to countries I never thought I would see and play for many fans. It is a dream for many people, but I know it will not last forever.”

I jumped out of bed and looked out the window. I saw the river and some ice shining in the morning sun. I looked at the sandbags that protect the buildings from water. Last week, I helped put them in place with many people from the town. My back still hurt from lifting them. 

I saw a boy on the other side of the river. I did not know him. He was trying to stand on a piece of ice near the warm water from a factory. I put on my kayaking wetsuit and checked my jacket pocket for my lucky silver chain. My grandfather gave it to me. It is special because only my mom, my grandfather, and I know about it. I also have my grandfather's diary from his trip to South America. I read it before I sleep.

I went to the kitchen. “Good morning, Rex,” my mom said. She smiled at me while I took a banana. “You are up early for a Saturday. I will make brunch after your training. Be careful.” 

“Thanks, Mom.” I walked down the hall and almost bumped into my grandfather. “Watch where you’re going!” he shouted. “Where are you going?” 

“Sorry, Grandpa. I’m going kayaking.” He always sees me in my kayak. 

“What is the point of training? You didn’t win the competition,” he said. His words hurt, but I took a deep breath and counted to three. He went into the bathroom and slammed the door. My mom came to me with a kind smile. “Don’t mind him. He’s…” 

“...not himself right now,” I said. I wanted to say he always is like this, but I didn’t. I remembered when I was little, he was my hero. He showed me pictures of his adventures. Those pictures are still on his wall with his medals. But I don’t go into his room anymore. I have my own trophies now. I hope one day my picture will be in a magazine too.

Mom smiled. “At least he is coming out of his room more. Have a good training session, Rex. I admire your hard work, even in the cold!” I smiled back and ate my banana. “It will be warmer in South America,” I said. “If I find sponsors for my trip.” She laughed and went back to the kitchen. I finished my banana and went outside to the boathouse.

Mum grabbed Jess's arm. "Come with me," she said. Jess followed her to the study. On the table, there was a painting by Grandpa. It was not finished and looked different from his other paintings. 

"Do you know anything about this?" Mum asked. Jess shook her head. "I’ve never seen it before. I didn’t know he was working on anything." 

Jess looked at the painting. It showed a river. It was not a river she knew, maybe it was just a made-up river. The painting was strange but beautiful. The riverbank was very small, with a little green. The river looked pale and seemed to go to a hidden sea. There were no animals, birds, or people in the painting. It felt right that way. Jess thought about autumn coming after summer.

Mum said, "It has a name." Her voice sounded a little strange. Jess knew why. Grandpa never named his paintings. He just painted them. Mum turned the painting over and pointed to the words Grandpa wrote. Jess read them: "River Boy." The name felt important to her, but she didn’t know why. 

Jess looked at Mum. "There is no boy." 

"Exactly. It’s strange for him to be so specific. Maybe he will add the boy later. I asked him about it once." 

"Mum! You should have known better." 

"I know, but I was curious. It’s such an unusual painting. You can guess his answer." 

Jess didn’t need to guess. She knew Grandpa would say, "It’s not up to the artist to explain a painting. Each painting has its own life and language, like a poem. We either understand it or we don’t." 

Mum laughed. "He said something like that. I hoped you might know about this painting since you inspire him." 

"Inspire?" Jess asked. 

"Yes, someone who helps an artist." Jess understood. Grandpa often said this when she watched him paint. But she thought he meant a goddess, not a real person. It was hard to think anyone could inspire Grandpa. 

"He doesn’t need me to inspire him," she said. "He has painted all his life."

This morning, I woke up and accidentally cut a hole in my bedroom carpet. I didn’t mean to do it. I could have tripped over my bed and the knife in my hand might have gone into the carpet. But I didn’t plan to damage the carpet. I didn’t wake up and think, “Today I will cut my carpet.” It just seemed like a good idea at the time. Later, I wondered why I thought that, but it was too late.

What I was really doing was trying to fit my corner cabinet into a corner. My grandma gave me the cabinet when she moved to a flat. It is small and painted white with pink and blue flowers. Grandma used to keep pretty things in it. Now, I keep my shells and stones there. I was very happy when she gave it to me!
