The cabinet is a corner cabinet, so it has to go in a corner. My bedroom is small and has only two corners. The big bedroom is for my parents, my sister Angela has the back room, and my brother Tom has the room over the garage. My room is very small, like a broom cupboard. 

Mum says when Angela goes to university, Tom can have her room, and I can have Tom’s room. But Angela is only fifteen, so I think I will be in my small room for a long time. I don’t mind; I like my little bedroom. It feels cozy, like a nest. 

The problem is, I don’t have enough corners! My bed is in one corner, and my wardrobe is in the other. I tried to put Grandma’s cabinet in the space between the roof and the floor, but it was too tall. Then I thought, if I can’t cut the cabinet, maybe I can cut a hole in the carpet. It seemed like a good idea. Dad always tells us to “think outside the box,” and that is what I was doing!

The book 'The Borrowers' is about a family of tiny people. They live in the walls and floors of a house. They take things from normal-sized people to survive. When I was asked to make a TV show from the book, I knew it would be hard. Many people love the book and have strong ideas about it. I looked at the original drawings to help me. The author wanted the show to show the Borrowers' view, not the humans'. This made filming more difficult.

The Borrowers are ten times smaller than humans. So, when we filmed them walking or borrowing things, we had to be ten times further away than usual. The crew had to crawl on the ground and film from very low, about 15 centimeters high. They wore out many pairs of jeans! We only raised the cameras for special shots. 

One big problem was making the shadows look right. We found a special way to do this. After the show, famous director George Lucas called me to ask how we did it. We built only one set, the Borrowers' home under the floor. It had big objects to make the actors look small. It was very fun. I remember the coins; they were bigger than dinner plates and hard to lift. We often stopped filming because the crew laughed so much.

In the story, there is a scene where the Borrowers go down a drain. To film this, the actors had to go down a tunnel with hoses. They said it was very scary! I wanted the costumes to look right. I had them made from heavy material so they looked like doll clothes. The leading actress could not bend or sit down in her costume. She had to be sewn into it every morning. The lead actor's trousers were made from a rug because normal fabric looked too smooth. It was very hot during filming, and I don’t think they liked the costumes!

Most of the action away from the Borrowers' home was filmed in front of a blue screen. The actors had to pretend to react to things that were not there. I drew pictures of every scene to show how they should look. I made 2,000 drawings! We could not spend much time in special effects studios, so I worked nights for three months. We had to work quickly. One time, I filmed a whole scene and then realized there was no film in the camera! But in the end, everything came together, and I think the show was successful in showing the magic of the books.

Mom stops the car at my new school, Palm Grove High School. She looks around nervously for reporters, but there are none. I know things will get crazy soon. There will be fake smiles and people wanting things from me. “Everything will be fine,” I tell her. She kisses my cheek before I get out of the car. Then she drives away, leaving me alone at this new school. But I wanted this. I wanted to leave my old life of traveling and tutors. Now, while the band is recording, we are staying here for good. I wanted to come to this school to meet normal kids. I want to meet kids with regular parents, like a mom who works in an office or a dad who cuts grass. That would be so cool.

I walk into the school office. “Hi, I need my schedule, please,” I say to the secretary. “Name?” she asks, looking unfriendly. “Desert McGraw.” “Desirée?” she asks, leaning closer. “Desert,” I say again. The secretary looks confused. “Oh,” she says and types my last name. Not many people know my last name because my dad uses a stage name. “What grade?” she asks. “Eleventh.” “One second, it’s printing,” she says. Then she gives me my schedule. My first class is English Literature. That’s good because English is my favorite subject. But I will be late. English is in Room 214 on the second floor. I studied the map last night so I wouldn’t look silly looking for my class.

When I get to the door, the teacher is already calling names. “Aurelio Gonzalez.” “Here.” I slip in quietly and sit at the back. The girl next to me smiles. She looks at my normal outfit – jeans and a T-shirt. “Nice shoes,” she whispers. I look down at my fancy shoes with flowers. Oh no, I shouldn’t have worn these. “Thanks,” I say. The teacher calls my name. “Desert... McGraw?” “Here,” I reply. The teacher smiles and introduces herself as Ms. Smigla. She talks a lot and gives us our course outlines. After that, she lets us talk to each other! 

“Why did you move here?” my new friend asks. I have a few answers. I could say I wanted a normal life away from cameras and reporters. Or I could say what my dad said: “We need a change, Desert. This is the perfect place to record the new album.” I think he just wants to relax on the beach. Why else would they choose a studio near the sand? “My dad had to move,” I tell her. “What does he do?” she asks. I know everyone will find out soon, but I want to pretend to be normal for a while. “He’s an artist,” I say, playing with my backpack zipper. “Cool. I’m Becca, by the way.” She seems not to care much. That’s great!

Many American teenage girls have a lot of responsibilities. They are expected to be the president of the Student Council, have a part-time job, and do volunteer work. They also need to do well in school. Being a teenager today is not easy. Boys and girls cannot just go to school and be average. They need to work hard and have big goals. 

Kristen Loose, a teenager, says that many adults do not understand how much pressure teenagers feel. They have a lot of homework, tests, jobs, chores, and they want to have friends too. Even with all this stress, people still think teenagers are lazy and disrespectful. Kristen thinks this is not fair. She says many people think teenagers only watch TV or use their phones all the time. 

Kristen uses her phone to help her with schoolwork. She can do homework anywhere now. Teenagers can listen to lessons on their way to school. Schoolwork does not stop when they leave school. Many teenagers wake up early, around 6 or 7 a.m., and go to bed after midnight. They have school, activities, family duties, and homework. They often do not get enough sleep. A study found that only 20 percent of teenagers get enough sleep at night. 

Lindamarie Olsen is another teenager. She says she has about 18 hours of free time each week. This is not much time. She does not spend it on social media or TV. Instead, she likes to volunteer and help others. She believes that many people think teenagers only care about themselves. But she enjoys helping her school and community. 

In the future, teenagers will still work hard and show that they can make a difference in the world.

The Earth to Sky Calculus Club is a group of teenagers who live in Bishop, a small mountain town in the US. This town is surrounded by nature and is near the Sierra Nevada mountains. The club has sent over fifty balloons high into the sky, about 35 km above the Earth. They do this as a science project and also for fun. 

One weekend in late spring, I joined them as they prepared to release a balloon. They wanted to see shooting stars. Shooting stars happen when a rock or metal from space falls into the Earth's atmosphere and makes a bright light. 

As it got dark, the teenagers attached a soft lunch box to the balloon. Inside the lunch box, there was a camera, a tool to measure how high the balloon goes, and a thermometer to check the temperature. They also put two GPS trackers on the outside of the lunch box to find it later. They used a gas tank to fill the balloon, which grew to the size of a small car. 

When it was time to launch, they counted down: “Five, four, three, two, one.” The balloon went up into the sky. Some of the kids ran with flashlights to follow it until they could not see it anymore. It was quiet, and everyone felt amazed. 

After the launch, most students went home, but a few stayed to watch for shooting stars. They lay on blankets and looked at the clear sky. I saw a boy get into a sleeping bag and fall asleep. One girl said softly, “We are the only ones talking.” Another girl whispered back, “I know.” Suddenly, a meteor flew across the sky.

As the balloon went up, it got bigger and bigger until it popped. A parachute helped the lunch box come back down safely. The next day, the students used the GPS trackers to find it. It was not easy to get it back, but that was part of the fun. The lunch box usually lands in a remote area. 

The leader of the group said that finding the lunch box is an important part of the project. They have only lost two lunch boxes in 53 launches. This time, the lunch box landed 84 km away from Bishop. The team had to drive a long way to get it. They had to decide if they should drive or walk to find it, especially if it was on a high mountain or in a tall tree.

In the end, it took them 11 hours to find the lunch box. It was in a canyon, on a flat rock, near a waterfall. The camera did not catch any shooting stars, which was a little disappointing. But it gave them a chance to talk about science and share another adventure story.

Chloe Morgan did not like science, especially Palaeontology, until she was fifteen years old. This change happened by chance. Her younger brother loved dinosaurs, and she helped him with a science project. While helping, she read an article about new dinosaur discoveries, and it amazed her. She decided she wanted to study Palaeontology.

Chloe met a famous young palaeontologist named Matt Cornelius. She was nervous to meet him because she thought he might not want to talk to her. But he was friendly and listened to her questions, which made her feel better.

Chloe thinks movies like Jurassic Park make people very interested in dinosaurs, but they do not show palaeontologists correctly. She feels that movies often show palaeontologists as strange or silly people. In real life, her job is very different. She digs up dinosaur bones, works in labs, studies fossils, and writes scientific papers. Sometimes, she talks to the public about science, especially to young people. She wants them to learn about science and dinosaurs.

Chloe helped with a TV show called Walking with Dinosaurs. She made sure the dinosaurs looked right and lived in the same time. The show was successful because it showed real dinosaurs, unlike the ones in Jurassic Park.

Chloe believes dinosaurs are interesting because they make us curious. They remind us that there is still much to discover in the world. Palaeontology is like traveling back in time.

When you travel by car with your family, even if you are six years old, you know you are not “there yet.” You keep asking, “Are we there yet?” But when you arrive, it is not “there” anymore; it is “here.” So, if you think you are “there,” you should ask, “Are we here yet?”

Parents hear this question many times on long car trips. Kids might think it is hard, but it can be nice to sit in the back seat. You can watch DVDs, listen to music, or do puzzles while looking at the beautiful views outside the window. 

In the front seat, your mom or dad drives the car. They give you juice boxes and cookies and change the radio. They help make the trip nice. 

But sometimes, things can get crazy. My younger brother, Tim, does things that annoy me. He might put his foot on my side of the seat. I do not like that, so I put my foot on his side. Soon, we are fighting, and our parents have to tell us to stop. 

After a while, I try to read, but then I feel something on my arm. Tim is blowing his breath on me. He is not touching me, but it still makes me mad. Our parents get angry again, and the car swerves. 

Over the years, Dad has found ways to deal with us. When we ask, “Are we there yet?” he sometimes says, “Yes, we are here. Get out of the car.” But we are still driving! Then he says, “Maybe we are not there yet.” This makes us quiet for a bit.

You know you are really “there” when the grown-ups get out of the car and walk away from us. So remember: if mom and dad are still close enough to answer your question, the answer is: no, you are not there yet.

John and Zuzi Morgan have opened a café in Oxford, UK. In their café, people can drink coffee, eat cake, and play board games. John and Zuzi want people to enjoy their time and come back again. Zuzi says they started this café because many people use phones and computers. They want to help people spend time together and talk to each other.

The games in their café are called "Eurogames." These games have simple themes, like farming and building. The first Eurogame was called The Settlers of Catan, made by a German designer named Klaus Teuber. In this game, players build homes on an island and trade things with each other. Everyone stays involved and has fun until the end of the game.

There are also "co-operative" games where everyone plays together as a team. In these games, all players can win or lose together. One popular co-operative game is Pandemic, made by Matt Leacock. In Pandemic, players work together to solve big problems. Matt was inspired by another game called Lord of the Rings. He remembers feeling scared and excited when he played it with friends. He wanted to make a game that made people feel good, no matter if they won or lost.

Matt loved games as a child, but sometimes he felt disappointed when they were not fun. With help from his uncle, he tried to make better games. Pandemic became very popular and had a great story. It is like a video game because players can change their characters and the game changes as they play.

Video games have helped board games become more popular. Many people now play games on their phones. Ben Hogg, who works for a game company, says that everyone plays games on their phones. More people want to play games than ever before.

At first, video games let people play together in the same room. But then, many games moved online, and players could not see each other. Some people who liked video games wanted to play games with friends in person again. 

In John and Zuzi's busy café, board games are more than just fun. In our online world, games are a way for people to share time together in real life, and this will keep happening.

Jamie Scott is a musician from the UK. He has written many popular songs. His story shows that hard work and not giving up are very important in music, even if you start slowly. Jamie's mother was a great singer and taught him to play the guitar. He only listened to a local radio station at home, which played music for older people. Because of this, he did not hear new songs until he was 12 years old.

When he was young, Jamie had to choose between playing tennis and making music. He played tennis very well, but he liked music more. He spent his lunch breaks in the music room at school. At 17, he left school to become a performer. He worked with a friend who played guitar but did not want to be a performer. Jamie told his parents that he wanted to make music. His dad said he had 18 months to succeed, or he would need to find a job.

At 19, Jamie got a chance with a music publisher after writing one song. But the music labels wanted him to be a solo artist, so he had to stop working with his friend. Jamie found success as a songwriter instead of a performer. He had a hard time with a record label in the UK and then moved to a new label to release a new album. He did not become famous right away.

Jamie believes he has been in the wrong place at the wrong time for his own music, but he has been successful writing for other artists. He helps new artists and tells them it is okay to want to write popular songs. He wants to write songs that many people will love. Jamie is honest about his goals. He wants to write big songs that can be number one. He focuses on making great music when he works with others. He wants to create modern pop songs that people will remember.

Tony Connor is a new kind of celebrity. He is famous online, but many people do not know him if they do not watch videos of bike tricks. He is a "street trials cyclist." This means he jumps from hard places like roofs or walls to land safely in other strange places. People film his tricks and put them online.

I met Tony one Saturday morning at a BMX park. The local boys know him well. Many older people also come to see him and call him "an absolute legend." After watching him, I agree. I thought he was just okay, but I was surprised by his bravery and creativity. Before each jump, he tells us what he will do, and sometimes I think he cannot do it. But when I tell him he did a great job, he does not seem happy.

Tony says he does not like being famous. He finds it hard to talk to fans. He prefers to do things instead of just talking about them. This is funny because he is famous because of social media and cameras. He says, "This technology helps people like me earn money." He feels that many people are always filming themselves or looking at screens, and he does not like that.

Tony makes good money from his videos. I have learned that two things help kids become great athletes: energy and the ability to handle disappointment. These are often more important than talent. In risky sports, it is very important to be strong in your mind. Even in the park, Tony fell a few times on easy things for him. But he got up and kept trying until he did it right.

Some people do not think Tony is a hero. They say he takes too many risks. He explains that these people do not know much about his sport. They have never tried riding a trials bike and do not understand what he does. He gets advice from experts to stay safe.

Tony is careful about risks. He says, "Some people are not scared, and they should not do these sports. Others are scared but can get past it. I feel scared but find a way to jump." He is not addicted to risk. He spends a lot of time planning and getting ready. Sometimes he rides around to feel good before trying a new trick. He knows he must stay calm before he jumps. If he focuses, he will be fine.

Helen Skelton is a TV presenter. She has done many dangerous things to help charity. She ran a marathon in the desert and traveled down the Amazon river in a small boat. 

For her new challenge, Helen walked on a high wire. This wire was 66 meters above the ground, between two tall towers. There was no safety net. She wore a belt that was attached to another wire above her. To help her stay balanced, she used a long stick that weighed eight kilograms. 

Helen learned from a teacher who is good at walking on high wires. She already knew some circus skills, but high-wire walking was very different. She said, "The training was a shock. I didn’t know I had to be so strong." 

Every day, her training started at 8 am. She ran up a steep hill, did exercises for one hour, and then practiced on the wire for another hour. She also learned how to fall safely onto the wire. When she fell, it hurt a lot. But she knew she had to stay positive. If she got nervous, the wire would shake too!

On the day of her challenge, it was windy. Helen took deep breaths and moved slowly along the wire. The walk was 150 meters long and took her 15 minutes. Afterward, she said, "That was the scariest thing I’ve done. I’m glad it’s over!" 

But Helen is not done yet. She is planning her next charity project: to reach the South Pole by ski, kite, and bike.

In 2006, Jeff Somers started a trip around the world on a penny farthing. This is an old bicycle with one big wheel and one small wheel. Jeff had already written a book about his travels in Canada in a very old car. He loved cars and worked on racing car engines. To save money, Jeff rode an old bicycle to work and used it to go to Amsterdam for a holiday. He said, “That trip opened my eyes. I wanted to see the world by bike.”

Jeff did not want a normal bike. He wanted to build a special one. He thought a penny farthing was the craziest bike. So, he went to a museum to learn how to make one. After trying to start his trip in 2001 and 2003 but stopping because of a knee injury, he finally left in 2006. He traveled for three years and visited 23 countries on four continents. The best part of his trip was arriving in Tibet and seeing Mount Everest. 

Jeff met other cyclists who could ride up mountains, but he was happy with his penny farthing. People were very surprised to see it as he traveled. His worst moment was when he had to drink dirty water from a stream. He got very sick and stayed in a hostel for ten days without medicine. He had no money for a hospital or to go home. 

Even with these problems, Jeff now says, “If I could afford it, I would start traveling again tomorrow on my penny farthing.”

I work at a university in the US. My team and I want to learn more about water birds, especially the American black duck. We just got a new tool called a ‘night-vision scope’. This tool helps us see the ducks at night! 

We are worried about black ducks because their numbers are very low. We do not know if there is enough food for them on the east coast. We have a lot of information about what they do during the day, but we do not know what they do at night. This is because we did not have the right tools before. 

The night-vision scope will help us see clearly, even when there is no moon. This will help us learn more and take better care of the ducks and their home. 

Our work is hard. There are four of us, and we work six hours every day. We have studied ducks in different places. Sometimes, I have to take a boat to see the ducks and write down what I see. The weather can be difficult. Some nights are warm, but many nights are wet. It is very quiet, so I drink a lot of coffee to stay awake! 

We have only missed one day of work because the snow was too deep for our vehicles. I like this work, even if it is hard. In the summer, we will work in a laboratory and look at our results together. It will be hard to be inside, but it is important. I would not change this job for anything!

Text: "When I tell people my job, they are surprised. I am not joking! I work with chocolate! I taste chocolate to make sure it is good for customers. Every week, I get small samples from our factory. I check the taste, feel, and smell of the chocolate. I also taste the nuts and fruit we use. I choose the best ones for the chocolate. 

Next to my office, I have a kitchen. In the kitchen, I can test and taste the chocolate I make. I share samples with my coworkers, and they like it! My kitchen has many machines and ingredients. It is nice to have my own space at work. 

Every day is different. Sometimes I work in the lab, and other times I travel to buy ingredients. I have a young family, so this can be hard. But I like the variety in my job, and I love chocolate! People often ask if I get bored of chocolate. I have worked with it for a long time, and I still enjoy eating it. I even eat more chocolate at home in the evening!"

Have you ever thought about what it is like to work in a circus? Sophia Grayson works at Circus Experience. This is a place that teaches young people circus skills. She says many people like her course because it teaches many skills. You can learn to juggle, throw and catch balls, and even do trapeze, which is flying in the air above an audience.

The course lasts one year. Students learn to take more risks in each class. Parents can come to some classes to see how their children are doing. Sophia says, “To be a circus performer, you need to do different things. It is important to keep your shows exciting. If you want to be good in the circus, you must practice a lot. You also make friends with other performers and learn from them. Being fit is very important. Circus performers train every day to stay strong. Training is important, but the best performers are those who want to succeed, have good ideas, and keep getting better.”

Some people think circus performers get hurt a lot or only work a little each year. But Sophia says the real challenge is to think about the future. You can only travel and perform when you are young. After that, you need to think about other jobs. The course also teaches business skills. Many students start their own businesses around the world and share their stories. But Sophia warns that you do not make a lot of money in this job! “You usually do not have a regular salary. It is also very competitive, but it is a lot of fun!”

You may not know her name or face, but you have probably heard her many times. Mariam Hobson is a backing singer. This means she sings in the background to help the main singer. Some people think backing singers are not as good as lead singers, but that is not true. They are very talented! Mariam says, "I love my job because I never know what I will sing when I go to the studio. It could be classical, jazz, hip-hop, or rock. Sometimes, I even sing funny songs for radio or ads. Once, I was asked to sing like a fish underwater! I never argue; I just do my job!"

Mariam needs to be very good at music and learn quickly. Sometimes, there is no music sheet to read. She remembers her first time recording music for a film. It was hard because there were eight singers, and each one sang a different part. There was also an orchestra. She was scared because if she made a mistake, they would have to record everything again, and nobody likes that. Recording can take a long time.

One of her favorite jobs is recording for songwriters. Some new writers do not know what type of music is best for a female voice. When they hear Mariam sing their song, they can see how to make it better.

Julie Deane started with little knowledge about fashion, but she made a successful business with her bags called ‘satchels.’ These bags are used by schoolchildren and are now sold in famous shops. Many celebrities also like these bags. 

Before making satchels, Julie thought about different business ideas, like cake decorating and party planning. She wanted to choose the best idea. Some people told her that no one wanted satchels, but she believed in her idea. Julie worked with her mother, who is good at business, to help her. The design of the satchels came from children’s storybooks.

At first, Julie did not know much about fashion blogs, but they helped her business grow. She sold about one satchel each week. To get more people interested, she sent satchels to fashion writers and hoped they would write about them. They did, and more people started to like her bags. Now, she is excited to see which celebrity will be seen with a satchel next!

While other companies spend money on ads, Julie uses the internet to get ideas for new styles. There was a hard time when another company copied her design, so now she makes sure to trust her production team. People who visit her office say it feels good to be there, and everyone enjoys working together. There is a new factory, but it is the team that makes the place special.

When Vicky Harmiston was a child, her parents let her and her brother Jamie choose what to do in their free time. Vicky liked to play many sports. She was a good swimmer, and her coach thought she could be a champion. But the swimming club was far from her home, so it was hard for her to train and do her schoolwork.

When they were teenagers, Jamie loved cycling. He bought a special racing bike and started to compete. Vicky thought this was exciting and wanted to try it too. She said it was the best choice she ever made. Soon, she was cycling every day and doing very well. The track was close to her school, so it was easy for her to go to training after school.

Vicky became a successful track cyclist and won many competitions. When she was 28, she stopped racing. Vicky said, “I loved winning, but I got tired of it. When the fun stops, there is no reason to continue. Luckily, I found a new job.”

Vicky now works for a charity called CycleZone. “We help young people who do not like sports,” she says. “First, we teach them to ride a bike. We want them to believe in themselves. CycleZone is great because it brings young people together.”

The charity uses famous people to help them. Vicky says, “Some people think having a celebrity is not always good for a charity. They say celebrities just want attention, and this can hide the real work of the charity. But if famous singers and actors can help, I think they should.”

Ana Ronson is a singer and songwriter from Ireland. Her parents did not play music, but there was always music in her home. Her grandfather played the guitar and taught Ana and her brother how to play.

Ana was very nervous the first time she sang in front of people at school. Her teacher had to help her off the stage. The teacher suggested that Ana join the school theatre club to feel more confident. After some time in the club, Ana sang happily with 50 other students at a concert.

A year later, her brother, who was in a band, asked her to write a song for them. Ana wrote her first song called "Falling Stars" in just three days. She liked it so much that she took a songwriting course with a professional. Even though she was the youngest student, she knew a lot about music. But Ana felt the teacher did not listen to her, so she wrote a song called "Something to Say" about this feeling. She shared this song online, and many people loved it.

Joss Alton, who owns a music company called Isotope Music, came to ask Ana to join his company. At first, Ana was unsure because she did not know the company well and did not want anyone to tell her what to sing. But Joss promised that would not happen. Soon after, Ana performed at a concert in Dublin organized by Isotope. All the tickets sold out quickly, and it was a great night.

Ana likes to write songs about real life, especially when things are not good. One of her favorite songs is "Decision," which is about why her brother stopped singing for a while and how sad it made him. Ana hopes her fans will like her songs, but she wants to write about her own important experiences.

Last year, I went on a great trip. I traveled by boat on a group tour along the west coast of Canada. My brother Harry had the idea. He is a journalist, like me, and he wanted to write about the trip. He loves boats, but I do not. I always wanted to visit this place because our great-grandparents lived there before they moved to Europe. I asked Harry if I could go with him, and he finally said yes!

A few days before we left, there were storms where we were going. But the weather was good for the days we would be there. I was busy at work and did not have time to plan. But Harry said he would take care of everything, so I felt better.

When we arrived in Canada, we joined the group, packed our things into small boats, and started our trip. The guide said very few people live along that coast. In the morning, we only saw dolphins and birds. There were islands far away, but the fog made it hard to see. I watched the pretty patterns our boat made in the water.

We often stopped to explore the rock pools on the beaches. They had many colorful fish that I did not know. It was nice to forget about time. We always remembered to make lunch and dinner together over campfires. At night, we slept on the boats. The beds were hard, but it felt good to relax.

When it was time to go home, I felt sad. I did not want to return to normal life. But I knew I would miss my family and friends. I was also excited to tell everyone about our adventures!

My dad was a basketball player in Germany. His dad was also a player. When I was a kid, I went to watch many of my dad's games. You might think I would love basketball, but I did not. I liked to tell my friends how good my dad was, especially when he won. But I often took a book to read instead of watching the games.

When I started secondary school, I was very tall. My sports teacher asked me if I wanted to train with the basketball team. I liked the training, but I thought I needed to get better before playing in a real game. The teacher believed in me more than I did. After some time, I agreed to play. A few weeks later, I played against another school. My parents came to watch, and it made me nervous. But it was OK in the end!

For the next four years, I practiced every day and did well. I even joined an adult team before I moved to a sports academy in the USA when I was fifteen. The coach there trained Olympic players, and it was great to learn from him. But I missed my parents. At home, I could not spend much time with my friends because of training, so that was not a big change for me. I got used to my new life, and my English got better too!

I became a professional player when I was eighteen, three years after I arrived in the USA. I was taller than most players, but I needed to get stronger. My coach knew a team that would take me while I was still in college, so I joined them and I have never regretted it.

Seven years ago, I was studying Tourism in college. I needed a part-time job because my studies were expensive. I decided to become a weekend tour guide in my city, Chicago, USA. I took visitors around the city, and I was happy to see how much I liked giving tours. I saw my city in a new way every time!

After I finished my studies, I wanted to be a tour guide full-time. I thought it would be easy, but I learned that I needed to know a lot more. To be a full-time tour guide, I had to answer many questions about Chicago, like its buildings, history, and public transport rules. After a few months of hard work, I got my tour guide qualification and became an independent tour guide.

Being a tour guide is not just about knowing facts. You also need to be fun and tell interesting stories. It is important to handle problems well. For example, if a place is closed when you arrive, you need to find a new plan. Tourists want to enjoy their tour, not hear about problems. I want my visitors to be happy, or they might leave a bad review online. Good reviews are very important because they help me get more customers.

I try to make my tours fun and easy. I put a lot of energy into my job, and because of this, I usually get good reviews. Many visitors recommend my tours to others who come to Chicago.

My name is Ella and I am 22 years old. Last year, I went to Thailand for two weeks with my sister Josie. Josie is five years younger than me, but we get along well. We went to help at an elephant sanctuary. This is a place where people take care of sick and rescued elephants. 

At first, I was not sure if we would fit in with the other volunteers because they were older than us. We were also nervous because it was our first time doing this kind of work. But in the end, we had a great time. 

One of our main jobs was to collect food for the elephants. Elephants eat a lot of grass and banana plants, so this took most of the day. Josie found it hard work, but I thought it was worth it to see the elephants eat. We also washed the elephants in the river with big brushes and soap. I had a lot of fun, even if I got wetter than the elephants!

In the evening, we took the elephants into the forest where they slept at night. All the volunteers stayed in the same house. Josie and I shared a small bedroom because she did not want to be alone. It was hot at night, but we were ready for that. The food was very good and did not have meat, which we do not like.

After dinner, all the volunteers and staff talked and played games. Now that we are back in the UK, Josie does not talk much about Thailand. But if someone asks her if she liked it, she says she loved it. I think she might be a little sad because she missed her friends. But when she thinks about it, she knows she was lucky to go there. Maybe she will go back one day – I will for sure!

My name is Gina D’Costa. I have a flower shop in the UK. I sell flowers to many people. Some people buy flowers for friends or their homes. Hotels and offices also buy flowers. Sometimes, I help businesses by providing flowers for their pictures. Once, I decorated a castle with flowers for a wedding. It was a lot of work, but I was very proud.

My day starts at 4 a.m. I go to the market to buy fresh flowers. Most people are still sleeping, and my friends think I am crazy, but I love my job. It is often cold and dark, but I do not mind. The flower market is amazing, with flowers from all over the world. It is hard to choose flowers. My favorite color is pink, so I would choose pink flowers for myself. But I have to remember that other people want different flowers. Not all flowers are available all year.

I do not like to argue about prices with the flower sellers, but I have to do it. Flowers can be expensive, so I try to get the best price. When I am back at the shop, we look at customer orders and prepare vases with the flowers. Then, we make flower bunches and check how much they will cost. Customers are often surprised by the prices, and I sometimes ask them to think again about what they want. 

Some people may think this is too much work, but I enjoy making beautiful flower arrangements for the money someone wants to spend. That is what you do when you sell things. I love my job!

My city has a modern cinema that shows new films. It is close to my home. A year ago, I wanted to talk about films with friends after watching them. So, I started a film club with two friends! We do not want to rent a cinema. Instead, we pick a new place in the city each month. 

For example, we used an old factory to show a film about Antarctica. It was very cold, which made it fun to watch the film. Some places are free because they sell snacks during the film. This helps us keep our prices low. We just want to cover our costs, not make money.

Each time we show a film, it gets easier. We have our own equipment now. We can see how many tickets we sell online, so we do not worry about empty seats. There is always a lot to do, but when people say they had a great time, it makes us happy.

Our website helps us a lot. We talk to other film clubs in the country and learn from them. We also started a blog because many people look for film information online. We put up some posters in cafés, but the best way to get new people is when friends tell each other about us. 

The audience loves the fun activities we have with each film. Last month, we had a movie quiz, and everyone enjoyed it!

Taking photos was my favorite thing to do when I was a child. When I was 15, I wanted to make my hobby better. I decided to take one photo every day for a whole year. Many other young photographers did this too, but I thought it was a great idea.

After a few weeks, I put my photos on a website for young photographers. I wanted to make a photo diary and show my photos to others. I was happy to see that people liked my photos. I enjoyed taking pictures of many different things. Then, someone told me that if my photos had a common theme, my project would be better. I agreed and started to take more photos of nature, especially birds and the sky.

Most of my photos were black and white. This was different from what other young photographers were doing because they took color photos. Sometimes, I doubted my project and almost gave up. But in the end, I believed in myself and became more confident in my style.

One day, I showed my project to my art teacher. She told me about a photography competition for young people. I entered some of my photos just for fun. I will never forget when the judges told me I won first prize. I was so happy because my project was very important to me. It was the first time I realized my photography was good, and I could be a professional photographer. Now, I have my own photography studio, and I am happy with my choice.

I joined the National Youth Challenge (NYC) last year. I wanted to try new things like camping and sailing. In NYC, you can do many activities and learn new skills. There are different levels, from beginner to advanced. Adult volunteers, called ‘leaders’, help us. When you finish a level, you get a certificate.

At first, my leader said I should help at a local children’s club for two hours a week. I was not sure about this. I had gone to that club when I was eight, but I found it hard to make friends. I was shy, and the other kids already had friends. I stopped going after a few weeks. 

But I decided to try the challenge because I wanted my first NYC certificate. Soon, I loved spending time at the children’s club. It was more important to me than just getting the certificate. When I finished the challenge, the NYC leader let me keep helping at the club because I made good friends with the children. Now, I go there for about four hours a week, and I always look forward to it.

Because of what I learned at the club, I want to go to college after school. I want to be a youth worker, someone who helps children. I never thought about this before. This has been my favorite part of NYC, and I have improved my communication skills while helping others. I have several NYC certificates now, and one is for camping!

I was born in Denver, USA. I started snowboarding when I was eight years old. My dad took me to the mountains, two hours from Denver. The hill looked very steep, and my dad had to convince me to try it. I did not think to ask him if I could snowboard, but he loved it and wanted me to love it too. He made it look easy. In the end, I did well. Soon, I loved snowboarding and got better at it. I started to compete when I was ten years old. Some people compete a lot and get bored, but I still love it. I like to win, and this helps me try harder. I enjoy not having a strict plan. Sometimes this works out well. I became the first girl to get a perfect score of 100 in a local competition. I was not sure I could do the jumps, but I tried and succeeded. This made me trust myself more.

In the summer, I train and study because there is no snow. I train every day, but I do not have to follow a strict diet like in winter. I also spend time with my friends. This helps me feel better when I cannot snowboard. I think about my future. Snowboarding is very important to me, but I want to have another job too, just in case I do not become a professional snowboarder or if I get hurt. I am thinking about becoming a doctor if I have time to go to college. I cannot imagine getting tired of snowboarding, but I know I cannot do it forever.

When I was fifteen, I wanted what my friends had. I did not think about the future. One day, my best friend got a new phone for her birthday. I wanted a new phone too. My parents said I could only have one if I paid for it myself. So, I decided to work part-time and save money. I am thankful to my parents for this. It taught me an important lesson.

I worked every Saturday in a café, but I did not like it much. My parents suggested I start my own small business. I saw my mum making necklaces, so I asked if I could try. I thought it would be hard, but it was easy! My friends thought it was boring, but I liked it. My mum showed me how to make pretty things at home with simple tools.

I sold my first necklaces to my friends and family. They said they liked them, but I was not sure if they were good enough. I wanted to know if other people would like them too. So, I rented a market stall with my mum. Many tourists came to buy my necklaces for their families and friends. Soon, people from all over the country called to buy more. They thought we were a big company, but it was just me and my mum at the stall!

That made me believe my business could work. I decided to make a website. Since then, I have made a lot of money from my business, mostly online, but we still have our stall. It has been a lot of fun!

When Janine Stuart was 13 years old, she wrote a book called Being Amelia. This book became very popular. Being Amelia is partly about Janine’s life. In an interview, Janine said, “My father’s job made my family move a lot. Because of this, I learned to make new friends. I know what it is like to be the new student in a class. This helped me write about Amelia, the main character, in her new school. Some funny parts of the book are about Amelia’s home life, especially with her older brother. I am an only child, so I had to use my imagination for that.” 

Janine started writing her book one summer when she was bored at home. Her mother wanted to be a writer, and her teachers told her to write, so it was a good way for Janine to spend her time. The year before, she won a short story contest on a young writers’ website. That is why, when Janine finished Being Amelia and sent it to a publishing company, they wanted to read it right away. They loved it, and a year later, Janine’s book was in stores.

One review of Being Amelia says that even though the cover shows happy teenagers, the characters face real problems. This makes readers believe in them. The reviewer thinks that even though Janine is young and her book is not very long, she is a better writer than many famous authors. 

Janine is still getting used to being a famous writer. She said, “At first, I hid when people saw me in the street, but now it is OK. I want to help other young writers, but they need to find their own way. For me, I just need to spend time with my friends, and then I will have something interesting to write about!”

I’m Tom. I am fifteen years old. Three years ago, my family and I moved to a castle on a small island. My dad got a job to manage the castle. He works for a group that takes care of old buildings. He was happy to get this job, but we were not sure at first. We thought about how life on the island would be. The castle is not as nice as our home, and there is no school on the island.

After we moved, we got used to living on the island. The castle is not very pretty, but our apartment is comfortable. In summer, many visitors come to the island, and there are parties on the beach. In winter, we only see the other families who live here. There are not many teenagers, which is sad for me. The adults help each other with work on the island.

The biggest change for me is taking a boat to my old school every day. I like going on stormy days when there are big waves, but the ferries do not run then. If I miss the bus to the boat after school, I miss the last ferry home. This makes me worry. When my friends come to visit, I always tell them to hurry!

The views are beautiful, especially when the sun sets over the sea. Some days it is very foggy, and you cannot see anything. But then, in a few hours, it can be sunny again. This is amazing, even after living here for a long time. We do have strong storms, and I sometimes wonder if the castle is safe. But I remember it has been here for many years, and it is still standing!

I live in a house in the countryside in Scotland. I love nature and animals. Six years ago, I started a new hobby – birdwatching! I went to the mountains in northern Scotland with my family. We saw many birds in nature. I watched them for hours with my parents. They taught me how to tell different birds apart and where to find them. It was amazing! 

After that, I joined a local birdwatchers’ club for young people. My goal is to see 200 different types of birds. I am close to this goal because I have seen birds in other countries on family holidays. We always look for places with birdwatching activities so I can see new birds! 

I have been to Egypt, and last summer I went to South America. I thought I would see my 200th bird there, but I didn’t. I learned that you need to be patient with birdwatching. I made a video about my birdwatching challenge and many teenagers liked it. They said it looked fun. 

My teachers saw the video and asked me to talk about birdwatching at school. I was nervous before I went on stage. I knew what to say and had notes, but many people were watching me! I felt better when it was over. The teachers said I did a good job. I might do another presentation next year!

I am lucky to live in the countryside. I know many teenagers in cities may not think about birdwatching, but there are many birds to see in green areas. I think birdwatching clubs should help more young people enjoy this hobby. Everyone should connect with nature, no matter how old they are, and it doesn’t have to cost a lot of money.

I started playing football when I was 7 years old. I would hurry home from school to play with other kids. I loved it, and I got better at it. My family thought I would stop playing like I did with other hobbies, but I didn’t. I wanted to play football professionally when I grew up. 

One day, I played in a local tournament. A referee saw me and told the manager of a women’s club to watch me. The manager asked me to join her club. I was surprised because I didn’t know young girls could play in women’s clubs. But the manager liked me, and I started training with the club when I was 13 years old. I got much better at football.

Some people were not sure I would be a star player, and that made me a little sad. But my coach told me to believe in myself. He let me play in an important match earlier than I thought I would. I ran very hard because I didn’t want to let my team down. Then, by chance, I scored the winning goal! I could hear my coach cheering for me, and after the game, my team carried me around the field. It was amazing! 

Since then, I have scored many more winning goals. Next month, my coach and I will have a football tournament for teenagers. We want to get them interested in football and help them meet other players. They will see what it is like to play in a big club and feel they can play for a top team if they work hard. I will tell them what my coach told me – there will be good times and bad times. I have been lucky and had very few bad times!

Text: 

In the UK and other countries, schools and universities want students to start doing research early in their studies. Research is not just for famous scholars or scientists. It is a way to learn and build skills. Research skills are important for studying and for jobs because they help us think about the world and our work.

As a student, you help create knowledge. You do not just repeat what you learn; you ask questions. You might wonder: Why? How? When? What does this mean? What if things were different? These questions are part of research.

Research can be very complex, but it can also be simple. It starts with asking questions about everyday things. Most students have done some research before. You have asked questions for school projects or when you wanted to learn something new. You have researched things like where to go on holiday, how to grow plants, or how to fix things at home.

In college and university, you are expected to ask questions, think critically, and explore ideas. Some students may find this hard because in some cultures, knowledge is seen as fixed. They may think they should only listen to teachers and books. However, in many places like the UK, US, and Europe, it is okay to question what you learn.

Thinking critically is very important in research. You should not just repeat what you read. You need to think about it, test it, and see if it makes sense. It is important to not just accept everything you are told without thinking.

Cities are important places for ideas and creativity. In the past, people met in coffee houses in London to talk about science and politics. In Paris, the artist Pablo Picasso talked about modern art in cafés. But living in a city can be hard. The same cafés in London that helped people talk also spread diseases like cholera. Picasso eventually moved to the countryside.

Today, scientists study how living in a city affects our brains. They found that city life can make us tired and can even make it harder to think. One big reason is that cities do not have enough nature. For example, patients in hospitals get better faster when they can see trees from their windows. Even a little bit of nature helps our brains feel better.

More people now live in cities than in the countryside. We are surrounded by many people and buildings. This can be stressful and can change how we think. When we walk in busy streets, our brains have to pay attention to many things, like other people and cars. This can make us feel tired because our brains have to work hard to focus.

Nature is different. It does not make our brains work as hard. This idea is called attention restoration theory. A psychologist named Stephen Kaplan came up with this idea. He believed that being in nature helps our brains relax and feel better.

Before scientists studied this, philosophers and city planners warned about the problems of city life. They wanted to bring more nature into cities. Parks, like Central Park in New York, give people a break from city life. Spending time in a park can help our brains work better quickly.

Many people look for ways to improve their thinking, like drinking energy drinks or changing office designs. But walking in nature is often the best way to feel better.

Even with the problems of city life, cities keep growing. Research shows that crowded cities can also be places of new ideas and creativity. The many people in cities help create new things, just like in 18th-century London. So, it is important to find ways to make city life better while keeping its benefits. Sometimes, people want to escape to the city, even if they also love nature.

**Where is the mind?**

This is an interesting question. We usually think that thinking happens in our heads. Today, we have special machines that can see what happens in our brains. But I believe we should not only look inside our heads to understand the mind. 

Many things around us help us think. For example, tools, decorations, and writing are important for how we think and grow as humans. This means that what is outside our heads can also be part of our mind. 

Scientists often study people without their things. This is good for understanding the brain, but it can make us forget that we think with the world around us. The mind is more than just the brain. 

I have a new idea called Material Engagement Theory (MET). This idea looks at how objects help us think. For example, when we use clay to make numbers or use a stone to make a tool, these objects help our minds. 

Think about a blind person using a stick. The stick helps the person feel and understand the world. The brain sees the stick as part of the body. This shows that our minds can change and grow with new tools and ideas. 

The mind is always changing. Objects, like tools or phones, help us learn and understand our world. This is why humans create things. These things also help shape our minds. I call this idea metaplasticity. It means our minds can change as we use different objects. 

In conclusion, we should remember that the things we use are important for how we think and understand life. Humans have always used tools to help us think better.

Text: "Photography is an important invention that changed how we see the world. In the United States, photography became a big part of culture. It is used in many ways, like science, industry, and art. Many people think photography is one of the best contributions to art in the US.

Photography started in the mid-19th century. It was popular because it used machines, and people liked new technology. Just like trains and electricity made travel easier, photography brought images of the world into homes. The camera helped people show who they are and share their lives with others. It also helped families keep memories, even if those memories were not always real.

A photograph shows us something special. It tells us what the photographer wants us to see. Because photographs are made by machines, they show real events and people. But the person taking the photo also adds their own view. This is why photography is called a "universal language." However, understanding a photograph can be complicated. The meaning of a photo can change depending on where and how we see it.

For many years, artists did not talk about how important cameras were. But now, artists use photographs in their work. For example, Andy Warhol used photographs in his art. Today, photography is seen as an important part of art, helping us understand and represent the world."

In 1890, William James, an American thinker and doctor, said that psychology is the "science of mental life." This means it studies how we think and feel. Everyone has a mind, so we all have some idea of what this means. We can study psychology in people, rats, and monkeys, but it can be hard to understand.

William James was very interested in how humans think and feel. He believed that our minds have basic parts: our thoughts, our feelings, the world around us, and how we know about these things. Our knowledge is personal and comes from our own experiences. Sometimes, this knowledge is different from scientific facts.

We often think we understand why people act in certain ways. For example, we might think someone is sad or angry. But problems can happen when two people see things differently. Psychology tries to help us find the best explanations for why people behave the way they do. Psychologists help us tell the difference between our personal thoughts and scientific facts.

Psychology studies the mind and brain. However, we do not know everything about how the brain works. Psychologists learn more by watching how people behave. They use these observations to make guesses about what is happening inside our minds. 

Studying psychology is like solving a puzzle. Psychologists look for clues in people's behavior. They must observe carefully and measure things accurately. They also need to think logically and share their ideas with others. 

Psychology aims to describe, understand, predict, and change how people think and act. When psychologists reach these goals, they can help us understand our experiences better. Their findings can help in many areas, like teaching children to read, making machines safer, and helping people express their feelings.

Psychology has been studied for a long time, but only in the last 150 years has it been studied scientifically. Early psychologists looked at their own thoughts to find answers, but this method has limits. Today, psychologists prefer to watch how others behave instead of just thinking about their own experiences.

In a building in Michigan, USA, there is a special place called the Museum of Failed Products. This museum has many products that people did not want to buy. Some examples are A Touch of Yogurt shampoo and Breakfast Cola. The museum is owned by a company called GfK. 

Carol Sherry runs the museum. She believes that each product has a sad story about the people who made and sold it. It is surprising that this museum can make money. Many companies do not keep samples of their failed products. 

The museum started because Robert McMath, a former marketing worker, wanted to collect new products. He did not think about how many products would fail. He learned that most products do not succeed. 

The museum shows how people often think positively about new products. They have meetings where they believe the products will do well, even if they won’t. Sometimes, marketers spend more money on a bad product to try to make it sell. 

There is a popular idea called "positive visualization." This means if you think good things will happen, they might happen. But research shows that thinking too much about good outcomes can make people less motivated to work hard. 

Psychologist Carol Dweck says that how we feel about failure depends on our beliefs. Some people think ability is something you are born with. They feel bad when they fail. Other people believe ability can grow with effort. They see failure as a chance to learn and improve. 

Dweck compares this to weight training. When you push your muscles to their limit, they get stronger. Having a growth mindset can make you happier, whether or not you succeed.

Text: 

Everyone knows that sports teams often do better when they play at home. But why is this? Many people think they know the answer, but things in sports are changing fast. Two main reasons make us question the idea of home advantage: science and money. 

Sports scientists want to understand how players can do their best. They have many ideas about home advantage. At the same time, people who pay the players want to know why home advantage is important. They think that if players are paid enough, they should feel good playing anywhere.

What about the fans? Would it matter if a team like Manchester United played some games far away, in places like the Far East, to reach more fans? Yes, it would matter to fans in Britain. They believe their team needs their support and energy. Fans often think that if they cheer loudly, their team will score. They remember the times when they cheered and a goal was scored, but they forget the times when cheering did not help.

One thing that fans believe is true is that home fans often cheer for their team and also for the referee. In a study, referees watched a game with crowd noise and another game without noise. The referees who heard the crowd were less likely to call fouls against the home team. This means referees try to avoid making calls that would upset the home crowd.

Studies show that home advantage has become less important in many sports, but not by much. For example, in the 1890s, home teams in England won about 70% of the time. Now, they win about 60% of the time. One reason for this change is travel. Today, players travel in comfort, and they stay in nice hotels.

Different sports have different levels of home advantage. Basketball has the most home advantage, followed by football. Baseball has the least home advantage. This might be because baseball is more about individual players, while basketball is about teamwork. In basketball, players feel more confident when they play at home.

Another reason for home advantage could be related to players' feelings. Studies show that players have higher testosterone levels before home games. This might make them feel stronger and more ready to win at home. 

In some recent games, teams that were not expected to win did very well at home. They showed great effort and did not let the other team intimidate them. As one referee said, "It’s the law of the jungle out there."

Text: "Gary Player, a famous golfer, once said, 'The more I practice, the luckier I get.' This saying is important for many athletes and their coaches. It means that when you practice a lot, you get better. 

Some people argue about who first said this quote. Player was not really talking about luck. He meant that practice helps you improve. 

There is a big question about talent: Are people born with talent, or do they get it from practice? Many believe that practice is more important than talent. Psychologist Anders Ericsson said that to be an expert in something, you need to practice for 10,000 hours. Many books, like Malcolm Gladwell’s "Outliers," support this idea. They say practice is the most important thing to become good at something.

However, author Epstein thinks this idea is not always true. He says that many studies look only at very successful people. He wants to find out why some people are good at things and others are not. He travels to many places, like Kenya and Alaska, to learn more.

In Alaska, he finds that the best sled dogs have a strong desire to win. This shows that some abilities might come from genes, not just practice. Epstein believes both nature (genes) and nurture (environment) are important for success. 

He also talks about race and gender in sports. He asks why we have separate competitions for men and women if practice is all that matters. Sometimes, the best questions are the simplest ones."

Many children in rich countries feel lonely and unhappy. Jay Griffiths asks why this is happening. In her book, Kith, she says that children spend too much time inside, looking at screens like TVs and computers. They do not go outside to enjoy nature, like forests, mountains, and rivers. This is a big problem.

A study talked to children to understand their feelings better. Many children said they would be happier if they could play outside more. Older people often remember their childhoods fondly. They think they had more freedom, like playing outside all day. They believe this was better than how children live today. However, these older people also made rules to keep their children safe, which means kids do not have the same freedom.

Griffiths writes about how parents worry about dangers outside. This worry makes them keep their children at home. Companies sell toys and gadgets to keep children entertained indoors. She also talks about strange rules, like making children wear goggles to play games. Some of these rules may not be very common, but Griffiths is upset about them.

Griffiths believes children should be free to explore and take risks. She thinks children learn how to be safe by having small accidents. However, she does not explain how to let children have these small accidents safely. Not all children want to play outside or take risks. Some children are shy or prefer to stay at home. It might not be fair to make all children act the same way.

I am a bio-psychologist. I have studied a lot. I am good at solving problems in my work and life. But school does not teach us how to solve all problems. Many problems need life experiences, not just school learning. For children, play is very important for learning. 

All young animals, including humans, play. Animals that need to learn more play the most. For example, meat-eating animals play more than plant-eating animals because hunting is harder to learn. Monkeys play more than other animals because they need to learn many things. Children play a lot because they have much to learn. 

Play helps children learn important skills. These skills are not taught in school. Children learn to think creatively, get along with others, and control their feelings through play. Creativity is very important for success in life. We need people who can think of new ideas and solve new problems. 

Some adults, called geniuses, keep their playful minds. Albert Einstein said school almost made him lose his love for math and science. He found it again after school. He called his creative work "combinatorial play." He imagined chasing a sunbeam to understand his ideas.

We cannot teach creativity, but school can take it away. School often focuses on answers that are already known, instead of letting children ask their own questions. It is also important for children to get along with others and care for them. Children want to play with each other, and through play, they learn to be fair and kind.

Play is fun and voluntary. If you cannot stop playing, it is not really play. Players must keep each other happy to continue the game. 

Today, school is harder. There are fewer breaks, more homework, and more pressure for good grades. Outside of school, adults often control games instead of letting children play freely. This has changed slowly over time. Parents worry, and experts warn about dangers. Many believe children learn better from adults than from each other.

Our children do not need more school. They need more play. If we care about children, we must let them play and explore. This will help them grow into strong adults ready for the future.

In many countries, more young people in their twenties are using social media to find jobs. Websites like Twitter and LinkedIn help them connect with employers. This is easier than before when people had to stand outside offices with signs that said "hire me." But using social media can also lead to mistakes.

For example, a young man in the US tried to connect with a marketing executive on LinkedIn. He thought she could help him find a job because she knew many important people. However, she was upset that he asked her to share her contacts. She rejected his request and sent a mean message that many people saw online. People were shocked by her message, and she might regret how she wrote it. 

This situation shows that young people need to be careful when using social media for jobs. Many young people use sites like Facebook and Twitter for fun, but using them for work is different. When I was a teenager, social media was a way to escape from parents and teachers. It was a place to show off and be creative. You could talk to someone online and then ignore them at school. You could also make yourself look different with pictures and songs on Facebook.

But now, using social media for work is not the same. Some young people still act like they did when they were teenagers. Just because many people liked your posts on Facebook does not mean you will get a job on LinkedIn. We need to understand that what we learned as teens does not work for jobs. 

Employers often say that young job seekers are too casual and seem arrogant. This makes older people think badly of us. In reality, many young people are worried about finding jobs, which is why they use social media. This impression of being arrogant can hurt their chances of getting hired, even if they have the skills to do the job.

So, how should you contact someone on a professional site? First, say who you are and explain how you can help them. This way, they are more likely to reply. Avoid sending the same message to many people, and be polite. Remember, social media can help you make good connections, but you need to use it carefully to avoid problems.

Text: "It is hard to know what will happen to newspapers in the future. Many people think newspapers are in trouble. Since 2000, many newspapers in the UK have lost a lot of readers. In the USA, only 26 out of 100 people get their news from newspapers now, down from 45 out of 100 in 2001. Some people say that printed newspapers will be gone in 15 years. 

But history shows that old types of media often stay around. In 1835, a journalist said that books and theaters would not be popular anymore, and that newspapers would be the most important. But theaters are still here, even with movies and TV. Radio is still popular, and movies are still watched, even with videos and DVDs. 

Newspapers were once new too. It took a long time for them to become the main way to get news. This happened because it became easier to share news with many people. People also started to think that things change all the time and we need to know what is happening. In the past, people thought life was more about seasons and big events like floods or diseases. 

Before the 19th century, being a journalist was not a real job for many people. Most people did not need news every day or week. Now, we can get news online whenever we want. We can choose what news we want to read. When big news happens, we can get updates very quickly. 

But newspapers often do not explain things well. They may be in danger of disappearing. Or maybe, as the internet makes things feel more confusing, newspapers can help us understand the world better."

Text: 

Humans are not very good at seeing in the dark. We are used to the light of the sun. This is part of who we are. Many animals, like owls and bats, can see well at night. They feel comfortable in the dark. But we have changed the night by adding a lot of light. This is called light pollution. 

Light pollution happens when we use too much artificial light. This light goes up into the sky instead of down where we need it. Because of this, the night is not dark anymore. Many animals, including birds, are affected by this light. They can get confused and fly into bright buildings or lights. Some birds even sing at night because of the light.

In the past, people used candles and lanterns. The night was much darker. Now, we have bright lights everywhere. This makes it hard for us to see the stars and the night sky. 

Darkness is important for all living things. It helps us sleep and stay healthy. When we have too much light, it can make us feel unwell. We need both light and dark to be healthy. 

In the end, light pollution makes us forget how special the night is. We lose our connection to nature and the universe.

A company leader said that his business will not keep track of how much holiday time employees take. He got this idea from another internet company that does the same thing. He said his daughter sent him a happy email about it. 

The leader thinks that employees can take as much time off as they want, but they must be sure that their work is done and that their team is okay. However, this might be hard to do. The internet company has 2,000 workers, but the leader's company has 50,000 workers. In a smaller company, workers know each other better and can help each other more easily. 

If workers feel guilty about taking time off, they might not take any holiday at all. This can make them stressed and less productive. Also, if workers worry about what their colleagues think, they might feel pressured to work more and take less time off. 

In many companies, workers often stay late, and this can make it hard for them to take holidays. If workers do not feel safe to take their holiday, they might think they look lazy. This could make them not take their holiday time, even if they have it. 

Today, technology makes it easy to get work messages anytime, which can mix work and free time. The internet company started their new holiday policy because workers wanted to change the old way of tracking time off. But without set working hours, workers might feel like they always have to work. 

Workers have the right to take time off because it is important for their health. Good feelings and creativity can happen even if workers are not always happy. So, I am not sure if this new holiday policy will really help workers take the time off they need.

Text: 

Peer review is when experts check a scientific paper before it is published. This process is important because it helps make sure that the research is good and correct. However, it can take a long time, sometimes up to a year, to publish a paper because of this review. Some people think this is good, while others do not.

There is a new way to share research called preprints. Preprints are drafts of papers that are shared online before they are reviewed. This allows other scientists to read and discuss the work quickly. Many scientists still want their papers to be checked before they are published, but preprints can help share new ideas faster.

Publishing in well-known journals is very competitive. Scientists want to publish their best work to get recognition and advance their careers. But this can lead to problems, like not sharing all the important data. Reviewers may focus more on whether a paper is good enough for a journal rather than if it is good science.

Some scientists are afraid that preprints will allow bad science to be published. But preprints are open for everyone to see and discuss, which can help improve the work. For example, a psychology professor shared her paper as a preprint. This way, the original authors could respond to her critique, and everyone could see the discussion.

Preprints allow scientists to talk about their work with others around the world. They can also share negative results, which are often ignored by journals. Sharing papers as preprints can lead to more people reading and citing the work. This shows that preprints can be a good way to share research quickly and openly.

When I ask my students what a poem is, they often say it is "a painting in words." But this answer does not make me happy, and it does not make them happy either. One day, I asked my students to pick an object and write about it. They had to write one paragraph like a scientist and another paragraph from the object’s point of view, calling it "Poem." One student wrote: 

"Poem 
I may look strange or scary, but I help people breathe. I am used only in emergencies and for a short time. Most people will never use me." 

The object was an oxygen mask. This choice helped the class understand how poetry works. The exercise was fun and led to good discussions. 

When I was in school, poetry was confusing for me. I thought every poem was a silly puzzle that made it hard to understand feelings. After school, many people read less poetry. Sometimes, you see a poem, and it is not like regular writing. It makes you want to read it, but often you feel let down because it is not interesting or hard to understand. 

What do we want from poems? We want deep feelings, beautiful images, and clever thoughts. But if we want tears, we watch movies. If we want information, we read articles. Novels take us to new worlds, and music is special with its words and sounds. 

However, poems can be unclear. Life is often unclear too. But this does not tell us what a poem really is. If you look up "poem" online, it says it is a type of art that uses beautiful and rhythmic language. This is hard to understand. The word "poem" comes from Greek and means "a thing made." A poet is someone who makes things. 

So, what kind of thing is a poem? Some poets say poems are like wild animals – hard to control – or like machines – made with care. But these ideas do not explain everything. The best part of trying to define a poem is the discussion it creates. Whether you think a poem is a machine or a wild animal, it can change how you think about both. 

Poems can be easy to remember, like song lyrics. Words and music can stick in our heads. A poem on a page can have a strong effect, even if it looks like regular writing. The space around a poem in a magazine could be used for something else, but a poem is special. 

A poem is written and rewritten like a story or article, but it is not just for selling. Publishers send out poetry books, but they do not expect to make money from them. A poem is not just a product; it is something special. Because it is different in a book or magazine, a poem can surprise us, even if just for a moment.

I bought my first metal detector after I got married. It cost £70, which was a lot of money then. My wife, Marion, was very happy when I found a gold ring worth £80 on my first trip. Over the years, I found many things like brooches and coins. I liked feeling connected to the past. 

After the gold ring, it took 40 years to find something that impressed Marion again. One rainy February afternoon, I had some time to search. I went to a place where I knew there were old farming tools. My metal detector beeped, and I found a piece of a metal wheel. Then it beeped again. I dug down into the mud and found a round, golden ball. I was excited but tried not to get my hopes up. 

As I cleaned it, I saw it was a beautiful, twisted necklace. I remembered seeing something like it in the British Museum. It was called a torc, and it is very old, from over 2,000 years ago. I took it to my car and looked at it all the way home. I washed it in my kitchen sink.
